trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.ondatachannel property is an EventHandler which specifies a function which is called when the datachannel event occurs on an RTCPeerConnection. This event, of type RTCDataChannelEvent, is sent when an RTCDataChannel is added to the connection by the remote peer calling createDataChannel().
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.ondatachannel 属性是一个 EventHandler ，它指定一个，当其被调用函数 datachannel 事件上的发生 RTCPeerConnection 。这种情况下，类型的 RTCDataChannelEvent ，是当一个发送 RTCDataChannel 被添加到由所述远程对等调用连接 createDataChannel() 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the icecandidate event occurs on an RTCPeerConnection instance. This happens whenever the local ICE agent needs to deliver a message to the other peer through the signaling server. This lets the ICE agent perform negotiation with the remote peer without the browser itself needing to know any specifics about the technology being used for signaling; simply implement this method to use whatever messaging technology you choose to send the ICE candidate to the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate 属性是一个 EventHandler 时，被称为其指定的功能 icecandidate 事件上的发生 RTCPeerConnection 实例。每当本地ICE代理需要通过信令服务器将消息传递到另一个对等方时，就会发生这种情况。这使ICE代理可以与远程对等方进行协商，而浏览器本身无需知道有关用于信令的技术的任何细节。只需实施此方法即可使用您选择的将ICE候选者发送到远程对等方的任何消息技术。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the icecandidate event occurs on an RTCPeerConnection instance. This happens whenever the local ICE agent needs to deliver a message to the other peer through the signaling server.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate 属性是一个 EventHandler 时，被称为其指定的功能 icecandidate 事件上的发生 RTCPeerConnection 实例。每当本地ICE代理需要通过信令服务器将消息传递到另一个对等方时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.oniceconnectionstatechange property is an event handler which specifies a function to be called when the iceconnectionstatechange event is fired on an RTCPeerConnection instance. This happens when the state of the connection's ICE agent, as represented by the iceConnectionState property, changes.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection.oniceconnectionstatechange 属性是当被称为事件处理程序指定的函数 iceconnectionstatechange 事件上发射 RTCPeerConnection 实例。当连接的ICE代理的状态（由 iceConnectionState 属性表示）改变时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.oniceconnectionstatechange property is an event handler which specifies a function to be called when the iceconnectionstatechange event is fired on an RTCPeerConnection instance. This happens when the state of the connection's ICE agent, as represented by the iceConnectionState property, changes.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection.oniceconnectionstatechange 属性是当被称为事件处理程序指定的函数 iceconnectionstatechange 事件上发射 RTCPeerConnection 实例。当连接的ICE代理的状态（由 iceConnectionState 属性表示）改变时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onicegatheringstatechange property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the icegatheringstatechange event is sent to an RTCPeerConnection instance. This happens when the ICE gathering state—that is, whether or not the ICE agent is actively gathering candidates—changes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onicegatheringstatechange 属性是一个 EventHandler 时，被称为其指定的功能 icegatheringstatechange 事件被发送到一个 RTCPeerConnection 实例。当ICE收集状态（即ICE代理是否正在积极收集候选者）发生更改时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onicegatheringstatechange property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the icegatheringstatechange event is sent to an RTCPeerConnection instance. This happens when the ICE gathering state—that is, whether or not the ICE agent is actively gathering candidates—changes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onicegatheringstatechange 属性是一个 EventHandler 时，被称为其指定的功能 icegatheringstatechange 事件被发送到一个 RTCPeerConnection 实例。当ICE收集状态（即ICE代理是否正在积极收集候选者）发生更改时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onidentityresult event handler is a property containing the code to execute when the identityresult event, of type RTCIdentityEvent, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when an identity assertion is generated, via getIdentityAssertion() or during the creation of an offer or an answer.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onidentityresult 事件处理程序是包含的代码，当执行属性 identityresult 事件类型， RTCIdentityEvent ，通过该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。在生成身份声明时，通过 getIdentityAssertion() 或在要约或答案的创建期间发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onidentityresult event handler is a property containing the code to execute when the identityresult event, of type RTCIdentityEvent, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when an identity assertion is generated, via getIdentityAssertion() or during the creation of an offer or an answer.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onidentityresult 事件处理程序是包含的代码，当执行属性 identityresult 事件类型， RTCIdentityEvent ，通过该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。在生成身份声明时，通过 getIdentityAssertion() 或在要约或答案的创建期间发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onidpassertionerror event handler is a property containing the code to execute whent the idpassertionerror event, of type RTCIdentityErrorEvent, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when the associated identity provider (IdP) encounters an error while generating an identity assertion.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onidpassertionerror 事件处理程序是包含代码的了when执行属性 idpassertionerror 事件类型， RTCIdentityErrorEvent ，通过该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。当关联的身份提供者（IdP）在生成身份声明时遇到错误时，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onidpassertionerror event handler is a property containing the code to execute whent the idpassertionerror event, of type RTCIdentityErrorEvent, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when the associated identity provider (IdP) encounters an error while generating an identity assertion.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onidpassertionerror 事件处理程序是包含代码的了when执行属性 idpassertionerror 事件类型， RTCIdentityErrorEvent ，通过该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。当关联的身份提供者（IdP）在生成身份声明时遇到错误时，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onidpvalidationerror event handler is a property containing the code to execute whent the idpvalidationerror event, of type RTCIdentityErrorEvent, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when the associated identity provider (IdP) encounters an error while validating an identity assertion.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onidpvalidationerror 事件处理程序是包含代码的了when执行属性 idpvalidationerror 事件类型， RTCIdentityErrorEvent ，通过该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。当关联的身份提供者（IdP）在验证身份声明时遇到错误时，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onidpvalidationerror event handler is a property containing the code to execute whent the idpvalidationerror event, of type RTCIdentityErrorEvent, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when the associated identity provider (IdP) encounters an error while validating an identity assertion.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onidpvalidationerror 事件处理程序是包含代码的了when执行属性 idpvalidationerror 事件类型， RTCIdentityErrorEvent ，通过该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。当关联的身份提供者（IdP）在验证身份声明时遇到错误时，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onnegotiationneeded property is an EventHandler which specifies a function which is called to handle the negotiationneeded event when it occurs on an RTCPeerConnection instance. This event is fired when a change has occurred which requires session negotiation. This negotiation should be carried out as the offerer, because some session changes cannot be negotiated as the answerer.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection.onnegotiationneeded 属性是 EventHandler ，它指定一个被称为处理功能 negotiationneeded 当它发生在一个事件 RTCPeerConnection 实例。发生需要会话协商的更改时，将触发此事件。此协商应作为要约方进行，因为某些会话更改无法作为应答方来进行协商。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onnegotiationneeded property is an EventHandler which specifies a function which is called to handle the negotiationneeded event when it occurs on an RTCPeerConnection instance. This event is fired when a change has occurred which requires session negotiation. This negotiation should be carried out as the offerer, because some session changes cannot be negotiated as the answerer.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnection.onnegotiationneeded 属性是 EventHandler ，它指定一个被称为处理功能 negotiationneeded 当它发生在一个事件 RTCPeerConnection 实例。发生需要会话协商的更改时，将触发此事件。此协商应作为要约方进行，因为某些会话更改无法作为应答方来进行协商。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onpeeridentity event handler is a property containing the code to execute whent the peeridentity event, of type Event, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when an identity assertion, received from a peer, has been successfully validated.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onpeeridentity 事件处理程序是包含代码的了when执行属性 peeridentity 事件，类型的 Event ，由该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。从对等方收到的身份声明已成功验证后，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onpeeridentity event handler is a property containing the code to execute whent the peeridentity event, of type Event, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when an identity assertion, received from a peer, has been successfully validated.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onpeeridentity 事件处理程序是包含代码的了when执行属性 peeridentity 事件，类型的 Event ，由该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。从对等方收到的身份声明已成功验证后，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.onremovestream event handler is a property containing the code to execute when the removestream event, of type MediaStreamEvent, is received by this RTCPeerConnection. Such an event is sent when a MediaStream is removed from this connection.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.onremovestream 事件处理程序是包含的代码，当执行属性 removestream 事件类型， MediaStreamEvent ，通过该接收 RTCPeerConnection 。从此连接中删除 MediaStream 时，将发送此类事件。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.removeStream() method removes a MediaStream as a local source of audio or video. If the negotiation already happened, a new one will be needed for the remote peer to be able to use it. Because this method has been deprecated, you should instead use removeTrack() if your target browser versions have implemented it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.removeStream() 方法删除 MediaStream 音频或视频的本地源。如果协商已经发生，则远程对等方将需要使用新的协商。由于不建议使用此方法，因此，如果目标浏览器版本已实现此方法，则应改用 removeTrack() 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.removeStream() method removes a MediaStream as a local source of audio or video. If the negotiation already happened, a new one will be needed for the remote peer to be able to use it. Because this method has been deprecated, you should instead use removeTrack() if your target browser versions have implemented it.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.removeStream() 方法删除 MediaStream 音频或视频的本地源。如果协商已经发生，则远程对等方将需要使用新的协商。由于不建议使用此方法，因此，如果目标浏览器版本已实现此方法，则应改用 removeTrack() 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.removeTrack() method tells the local end of the connection to stop sending media from the specified track, without actually removing the corresponding RTCRtpSender from the list of senders as reported by RTCPeerConnection.getSenders(). If the track is already stopped, or is not in the connection's senders list, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.removeTrack() 方法告诉连接的本地端以停止从指定的轨道发送媒体，而无需实际去除相应 RTCRtpSender 从发件人列表作为由报道 RTCPeerConnection.getSenders() 。如果轨道已经停止，或者不在连接的发件人列表中，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.removeTrack() method tells the local end of the connection to stop sending media from the specified track, without actually removing the corresponding RTCRtpSender from the list of senders as reported by RTCPeerConnection.getSenders().
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.removeTrack() 方法告诉连接的本地端以停止从指定的轨道发送媒体，而无需实际去除相应 RTCRtpSender 从发件人列表作为由报道 RTCPeerConnection.getSenders() 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.setIdentityProvider() method sets the Identity Provider (IdP) to the triplet given in parameter: its name, the protocol used to communicate with it (optional) and an optional username. The IdP will be used only when an assertion is needed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.setIdentityProvider() 方法集身份提供商（IDP）在参数给出的三元组：其名称，使用的协议与它（可选）和一个可选的用户名进行通信。仅在需要断言时才使用IdP。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() method changes the local description associated with the connection. This description specifies the properties of the local end of the connection, including the media format.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 方法改变与连接相关联的本地描述。此描述指定连接本地端的属性，包括媒体格式。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() method changes the local description associated with the connection. This description specifies the properties of the local end of the connection, including the media format. The method takes a single parameter—the session description—and it returns a Promise which is fulfilled once the description has been changed, asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 方法改变与连接相关联的本地描述。此描述指定连接本地端的属性，包括媒体格式。该方法采用单个参数（会话描述），并返回一个 Promise ，一旦描述被更改，该Promise将被异步实现。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() method changes the remote description associated with the connection. This description specifies the properties of the remote end of the connection, including the media format.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() 方法改变与所述连接相关联的远程描述。此描述指定连接的远程端的属性，包括媒体格式。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() method changes the remote description associated with the connection. This description specifies the properties of the remote end of the connection, including the media format. The method takes a single parameter—the session description—and it returns a Promise which is fulfilled once the description has been changed, asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() 方法改变与所述连接相关联的远程描述。此描述指定连接的远程端的属性，包括媒体格式。该方法采用单个参数（会话描述），并返回一个 Promise ，一旦描述被更改，该Promise将被异步实现。

trans-unit.source: The RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent() constructor creates a new RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The RTCRtpTransceiverDirection type is an enumerated set of strings which are used to describe the directionality of a RTCRtpTransceiver instance. Both the preferred direction and the currentDirection properties are of this type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCRtpTransceiverDirection 类型是一个枚举集被用于描述的方向性串 RTCRtpTransceiver 实例。首选 direction 和 currentDirection 属性都是这种类型。

trans-unit.source: The RTCSessionDescription.toJSON() method generates a JSON description of the object. Both properties, type and sdp, are contained in the generated JSON.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCSessionDescription.toJSON() 方法生成一个JSON对象的描述。 type 和 sdp 这两个属性都包含在生成的JSON中。

trans-unit.source: The RTCStatsReport interface is used to provide statistics data about WebRTC connections as returned by the RTCPeerConnection.getStats(), RTCRtpReceiver.getStats(), and RTCRtpSender.getStats() methods. This object consists of a mapping of strings which identify a category of statistics to objects which contains the various measured values for each.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCStatsReport 接口用于提供统计数据有关的WebRTC连接由作为返回 RTCPeerConnection.getStats() ， RTCRtpReceiver.getStats() ，和 RTCRtpSender.getStats() 方法。此对象由字符串映射组成，这些字符串标识统计信息到对象的类别，这些对象包含每个对象的各种测量值。

trans-unit.source: The RTCStatsType enumerated type (enum) is a set of strings which define the type of statistics reported in an RTCStats object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RTCStatsType 枚举类型（枚举）是一组限定了字符串的 type 在报告的统计信息的 RTCStats 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Range() constructor returns a newly created Range object whose start and end is the global Document object.
trans-unit.target: 该 Range() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 Range 对象，它的起点和终点是全局 Document 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Range.cloneRange() method returns a Range object with boundary points identical to the cloned Range.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Range.cloneRange() 方法返回一个 Range 与等同于克隆边界点对象 Range 。

trans-unit.source: The Range.collapse() method collapses the Range to one of its boundary points.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Range.collapse() 方法合拢 Range 到它的边界点中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The Range.collapsed read-only property returns a Boolean flag indicating whether the start and end points of the Range are at the same position. It returns true if the start and end boundary points of the Range are the same point in the DOM, false if not.
trans-unit.target: 该 Range.collapsed 只读属性返回 Boolean 标志指示的起点和终点是否 Range 都在同一位置。如果 Range 的起点和终点边界点与DOM中的同一点，则返回 true ;否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The Range.commonAncestorContainerread-only property returns the deepest — or furthest down the document tree — Node that contains both boundary points of the range. This means that if Range.startContainer and Range.endContainer both refer to the same node, this node is the commonAncestorContainer.
trans-unit.target: 该 Range.commonAncestorContainer 只读属性返回最深的-或者向下最远文档树- Node 包含这两个边界点的范围内的。这意味着，如果 Range.startContainer 和 Range.endContainer 都引用相同的节点，则此节点为 commonAncestorContainer 。

trans-unit.source: The Range.commonAncestorContainerread-only property returns the deepest — or furthest down the document tree — Node that contains both boundary points of the range. This means that if Range.startContainer and Range.endContainer both refer to the same node, this node is the commonAncestorContainer.
The Range.endOffset read-only property returns a number representing where in the Range.endContainer the Range ends.
trans-unit.target: 该 Range.endOffset 只读属性返回一个表示其中的一些 Range.endContainer 的 Range 末端。

trans-unit.source: The Range.insertNode() method inserts a node at the start of the Range.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Range.insertNode() 方法插入在所述的开始的节点 Range 。

trans-unit.source: The Range.setEndBefore() method sets the end position of a Range relative to another Node. The parent Node of end of the Range will be the same as that for the referenceNode.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Range.setEndBefore() 方法设置了一个的结束位置 Range 相对于另一 Node 。 Range 范围的末尾的父 Node 将与 referenceNode 的父节点相同。

trans-unit.source: The Range.startContainer read-only property returns the Node within which the Range starts. To change the start position of a node, use one of the Range.setStart() methods.
trans-unit.target: 该 Range.startContainer 只读属性返回 Node 内该 Range 开始。若要更改节点的开始位置，请使用 Range.setStart() 方法之一。

trans-unit.source: The Range.startOffset read-only property returns a number representing where in the startContainer the Range starts.
trans-unit.target: 该 Range.startOffset 只读属性返回一个表示其中的一些 startContainer 的 Range 开始。

trans-unit.source: The ReadableStreamBYOBRequest interface of the Streams API represents a pull request into a ReadableByteStreamController view.
trans-unit.target: Streams API的 ReadableStreamBYOBRequest 接口表示对 ReadableByteStreamController 视图的拉取请求。

trans-unit.source: The Request() constructor creates a new Request object.
trans-unit.target: 该 Request() 构造函数创建一个新的 Request 对象。

trans-unit.source: The RequestDestination enumerated type contains the permitted values for a request's destination. These string values indicate potential types of content that a request may try to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RequestDestination 枚举类型包含一个请求的允许值 destination 。这些字符串值指示请求可能尝试检索的潜在内容类型。

trans-unit.source: The Response() constructor creates a new Response object.
trans-unit.target: 该 Response() 构造函数创建一个新的 Response 对象。

trans-unit.source: The SVGAElement.target read-only property of SVGAElement returns an SVGAnimatedString object that specifies the portion of a target window, frame, pane into which a document is to be opened when a link is activated.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGAElement.target 只读的属性 SVGAElement 返回 SVGAnimatedString 指定当链接被激活的目标窗口，框架，窗格到其中一个文件是部分被打开的对象。

trans-unit.source: The SVGAnimatedString interface represents string attributes which can be animated from each SVG declaration. You need to create SVG attribute before doing anything else, everything should be declared inside this.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGAnimatedString 接口表示可以从每个SVG声明被动画串的属性。您需要先创建SVG属性，然后再执行其他操作，所有内容都应在此声明。

trans-unit.source: The SVGAnimationElement.onbegin property refers to the event handler for the beginEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 SVGAnimationElement.onbegin 房地产是指为在事件处理程序 beginEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The SVGAnimationElement.onend property refers to the event handler for the endEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 SVGAnimationElement.onend 房地产是指为在事件处理程序 endEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The SVGAnimationElement.onrepeat property refers to the event handler for the repeatEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 SVGAnimationElement.onrepeat 房地产是指为在事件处理程序 repeatEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The SVGAnimationElement.targetElement property refers to the element which is being animated. If no target element is being animated (for example, because the href attribute specifies an unknown element), the value returned is null.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGAnimationElement.targetElement 属性指的是被动画的元素。如果没有对目标元素进行动画处理（例如，因为 href 属性指定了未知元素），则返回的值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The SVGElement.dataset property allows access, both in reading and writing mode, to all the custom data attributes (data-*) set on the element. It is a map of DOMStrings representing keys to DOMStrings representing the values for those keys, with one entry for each custom data attribute. Each key corresponds to the name of a custom data attribute; for example, a custom attribute named data-foo is in the map with the key "foo".
trans-unit.target: 该 SVGElement.dataset 属性允许访问，无论是在读写模式下，所有的自定义数据属性（ data-* 的元素）集合。它是地图上 DOMString 代表中国键 DOMString 代表中国为这些键的值，其为每个自定义数据属性的一个条目。每个键对应一个自定义数据属性的名称。例如，映射中的自定义属性 data-foo 的键为 "foo" 。

trans-unit.source: The SVGGeometryElement.getPointAtLength() method returns the point at a given distance along the path.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGGeometryElement.getPointAtLength() 方法返回在沿着路径的给定距离的点。

trans-unit.source: The SVGGeometryElement.getTotalLength() method returns the user agent's computed value for the total length of the path in user units.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGGeometryElement.getTotalLength() 方法返回在用户单元中的路径的总长度的用户代理的计算值。

trans-unit.source: The SVGGeometryElement.isPointInFill() method determines whether a given point is within the fill shape of an element. Normal hit testing rules apply; the value of the pointer-events property on the element determines whether a point is considered to be within the fill. The point argument is interpreted as a point in the local coordiante system of the element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGGeometryElement.isPointInFill() 方法确定一个给定的点是否是一个元素的填充形状内。正常的点击测试规则适用；元素上的 pointer-events 属性的值确定是否将某个点视为在填充内。该 point 参数被解释为在该元件的本地coordiante系统的点。

trans-unit.source: The SVGGeometryElement.isPointInStroke() method determines whether a given point is within the stroke shape of an element. Normal hit testing rules apply; the value of the pointer-events property on the element determines whether a point is considered to be within the stroke. The point argument is interpreted as a point in the local coordiante system of the element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGGeometryElement.isPointInStroke() 方法确定一个给定的点是否是一个元件的行程形状内。正常的点击测试规则适用；元素上的 pointer-events 属性的值确定是否将某个点视为在笔触内。该 point 参数被解释为在该元件的本地coordiante系统的点。

trans-unit.source: The SVGGeometryElement.pathLength property reflects the pathLength attribute and returns the total length of the path, in user units.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGGeometryElement.pathLength 属性反映 pathLength 属性，并返回路径的总长度，以用户为单位。

trans-unit.source: The SVGPathElement.getTotalLength() method returns the user agent's computed value for the total length of the path in user units.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SVGPathElement.getTotalLength() 方法返回在用户单元中的路径的总长度的用户代理的计算值。

trans-unit.source: The SecurityPolicyViolationEvent constructor creates a new SecurityPolicyViolationEvent object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 SecurityPolicyViolationEvent 构造函数创建一个新的 SecurityPolicyViolationEvent 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onnotificationclose property is an event handler called whenever the notificationclose event is dispatched on the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope object, that is when a user closes a displayed notification spawned by ServiceWorkerRegistration.showNotification().
trans-unit.target: 所述 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onnotificationclose 属性是每当调用的事件处理程序 notificationclose 事件在上调度 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 对象，即当用户关闭通过催生了显示的通知 ServiceWorkerRegistration.showNotification() 。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onpush event of the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope interface is fired whenever a push message is received by a service worker via a push server.
trans-unit.target: 每当服务人员通过推送服务器接收到推送消息时，都会触发 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onpush 事件。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onpushsubscriptionchange event of the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope interface is fired to indicate a change in push subscription that was triggered outside the application's control, e.g. when browser refresh the push subscription.
trans-unit.target: 触发 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onpushsubscriptionchange 事件，以指示在应用程序控制之外触发的推送订阅中的更改，例如，当浏览器刷新推送订阅时。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceWorkerState is associated with its ServiceWorker's state.
trans-unit.target: 该 ServiceWorkerState 与其相关 ServiceWorker 的状态。

trans-unit.source: The ShadowRoot interface of the Shadow DOM API is the root node of a DOM subtree that is rendered separately from a document's main DOM tree.
trans-unit.target: Shadow DOM API 的 ShadowRoot 接口是DOM子树的根节点，该子树与文档的主DOM树分开呈现。

trans-unit.source: The SharedWorker() constructor creates a SharedWorker object that executes the script at the specified URL. This script must obey the same-origin policy.
trans-unit.target: 该 SharedWorker() 构造函数创建一个 SharedWorker ，在指定的URL执行脚本的对象。该脚本必须遵守同源策略。

trans-unit.source: The SharedWorker interface represents a specific kind of worker that can be accessed from several browsing contexts, such as several windows, iframes or even workers. They implement an interface different than dedicated workers and have a different global scope, SharedWorkerGlobalScope.
trans-unit.target: 该 SharedWorker 接口表示特定种类的工人可以访问几个浏览上下文，如多个窗口，I帧，甚至工人。它们实现的接口不同于专用工作者，并且具有不同的全局范围 SharedWorkerGlobalScope 。

trans-unit.source: The SourceBuffer() getter method of the SourceBufferList interface allows the SourceBuffer objects in the list to be accessed with an array operator (i.e. [].)
trans-unit.target: SourceBufferList 接口的 SourceBuffer() getter方法允许使用数组运算符（即 [] ）访问列表中的 SourceBuffer 对象。

trans-unit.source: The SpeechGrammar constructor of the SpeechGrammar interface creates a new SpeechGrammar object instance.
trans-unit.target: SpeechGrammar 接口的 SpeechGrammar 构造函数将创建一个新的 SpeechGrammar 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The SpeechGrammarList() constructor creates a new SpeechGrammarList object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 SpeechGrammarList() 构造函数创建一个新的 SpeechGrammarList 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognition() constructor creates a new SpeechRecognition object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 SpeechRecognition() 构造函数创建一个新的 SpeechRecognition 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The StereoPannerNode interface represents a simple stereo panner node that can be used to pan an audio stream left or right.
trans-unit.target: 所述 StereoPannerNode 接口表示可用于平移向左或向右的音频流的简单立体声声像节点。

trans-unit.source: The StyleSheet.disabled property indicates whether the style sheet is prevented from applying to the document. A style sheet may be disabled by manually setting this property to true or if it's an inactive alternative style sheet. Note that disabled == false does not guarantee the style sheet is applied (it could be removed from the document, for instance).
trans-unit.target: 所述 StyleSheet.disabled 属性指示是否该样式表是从施加到文档防止。可以通过将属性手动设置为 true 来禁用样式表，或者将其设置为无效的替代样式表。请注意， disabled == false 不能保证应用样式表（例如，可以从文档中删除样式表）。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.decrypt() method returns a Promise of the plaintext corresponding to the ciphertext data, algorithm and key given as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.decrypt() 方法返回一个 Promise 所述的明文对应于密文作为参数给出数据，算法和密钥。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.deriveKey() method returns a Promise of a newly generated CryptoKey derived from a master key and a specific algorithm given as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.deriveKey() 方法返回一个 Promise 一个新生成的 CryptoKey 从主密钥和给定的作为参数的特定算法导出。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.digest() method returns a Promise of a digest generated from the hash function and text given as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.digest() 方法返回一个 Promise 的消化从所生成的散列函数给定为参数和文本。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.encrypt() method returns a Promise of the encrypted data corresponding to the plaintext data, algorithm and key given as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.encrypt() 方法返回一个 Promise 对应于经加密的数据的明文作为参数给出数据，算法和密钥。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.exportKey() method returns a Promise of the key encrypted in the requested format. If the key is not extractable, that is if CryptoKey.extractable returns false, the promise fails with an InvalidAccessError exception; it the format is unknown, the promise fails with a NotSupported exception.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.exportKey() 方法返回一个 Promise 以所需格式加密的密钥。如果密钥不可提取，即 CryptoKey.extractable 返回 false ，则诺言将失败，并显示 InvalidAccessError 异常；如果格式未知，则Promise会失败，并出现 NotSupported 异常。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.generateKey() method returns a Promise of a newly generated CryptoKey, for symmetrical algorithms, or a CryptoKeyPair, containing two newly generated keys, for asymmetrical algorithm, that matches the algorithm, the usages and the extractability given as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.generateKey() 方法返回一个 Promise 一个新生成的 CryptoKey ，为对称的算法，或一 CryptoKeyPair ，含有两个新生成的密钥，用于非对称算法，该算法匹配，用途和作为参数给出的提取性。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.importKey() method returns a Promise of the CryptoKey generated from the data given in parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.importKey() 方法返回一个 Promise 所述的 CryptoKey 从在参数给出的数据生成的。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.sign() method returns a Promise containing the signature corresponding to the text, algorithm and key given as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.sign() 方法返回一个 Promise 包含签名对应于文本，算法和密钥给定为参数。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.unwrapKey() method returns a Promise of a CryptoKey corresponding to the wrapped key given in parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.unwrapKey() 方法返回一个 Promise 一个的 CryptoKey 相对应的在参数给出的包装密钥。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.verify() method returns a Promise of a Boolean value indicating if the signature given as parameter matches the text, algorithm and key also given as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.verify() 方法返回一个 Promise 一个的 Boolean 值，指示如果签名给定的参数的文本，算法和密钥给出作为参数相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto.wrapKey() method returns a Promise of a wrapped symmetric key for usage (transfer, storage) in unsecure environments. The wrapped buffer returned is in the format given in parameters, and contains the key wrapped by the given wrapping key with the given algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 所述 SubtleCrypto.wrapKey() 方法返回一个 Promise 用于在不安全的环境中的使用（传输，存储）包裹对称密钥。返回的包装缓冲区采用参数中给定的格式，并包含由给定包装键和给定算法包装的键。

trans-unit.source: The SubtleCrypto interface represents a set of cryptographic primitives. It is available via the Crypto.subtle properties available in a window context (via Window.crypto).
trans-unit.target: 该 SubtleCrypto 接口表示一组密码基元。它可以通过窗口上下文中的 Crypto.subtle 属性（通过 Window.crypto ）获得。

trans-unit.source: The Text() constructor returns a newly created Text object with the optional DOMString given in parameter as its textual content.
trans-unit.target: 该 Text() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 Text 与可选的对象 DOMString 参数给出它的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: The TextDecoder() constructor returns a newly created TextDecoder object for the encoding specified in parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述 TextDecoder() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 TextDecoder 在参数中指定的编码的对象。

trans-unit.source: The TextDecoder interface represents a decoder for a specific method, that is a specific character encoding, like utf-8, iso-8859-2, koi8, cp1261, gbk, etc. A decoder takes a stream of bytes as input and emits a stream of code points. For a more scalable, non-native library, see StringView – a C-like representation of strings based on typed arrays.
trans-unit.target: 所述 TextDecoder 接口表示为特定方法的解码器，这是一个特定的字符编码，如 utf-8 ， iso-8859-2 ， koi8 ， cp1261 ， gbk 等的解码器需要一个字节流作为输入，并发出一个流代码点。有关更可扩展的非本机库，请参见 StringView –基于类型数组的字符串的C表示。

trans-unit.source: The TextEncoder() constructor returns a newly created utf-8 TextEncoder object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 TextEncoder() 构造函数返回一个新创建的UTF-8 TextEncoder 对象。

trans-unit.source: The TextTrack.mode property is a string which indicates the text track's mode. You can read this value to determine the current mode, and you can change this value to switch modes.
trans-unit.target: 该 TextTrack.mode 属性是指示文本轨道的模式的字符串。您可以读取此值以确定当前模式，也可以更改此值以切换模式。

trans-unit.source: The Touch.clientYread-only property returns the Y coordinate of the touch point relative to the browser's viewport, not including any scroll offset.
trans-unit.target: 该 Touch.clientY 只读属性返回相对于浏览器的视窗触摸点的Y坐标，不包括任何滚动偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The Touch.force read-only property returns the amount of pressure the user is applying to the touch surface for a Touch point.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Touch.force 只读属性使用户返回被施加到触摸表面为一个的压力量 Touch 点。

trans-unit.source: The Touch.pageY read-only property returns the Y coordinate of the touch point relative to the viewport, including any scroll offset.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Touch.pageY 只读属性返回相对于触摸点的Y坐标到视，包括任何滚动偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The TrackDefault() constructor of the TrackDefault interface constructs and returns a new TrackDefault object.
trans-unit.target: TrackDefault 接口的 TrackDefault() 构造函数构造并返回一个新的 TrackDefault 对象。

trans-unit.source: The TrackDefault() getter method of the TrackDefaultList interface allows the TrackDefault objects in the list to be accessed with an array operator (i.e. [].)
trans-unit.target: TrackDefaultList 接口的 TrackDefault() getter方法允许使用数组运算符（即 [] ）访问列表中的 TrackDefault 对象。

trans-unit.source: The TrackDefaultList() constructor of the TrackDefaultList interface constructs and returns a new TrackDefaultList object.
trans-unit.target: TrackDefaultList 接口的 TrackDefaultList() 构造函数构造并返回一个新的 TrackDefaultList 对象。

trans-unit.source: The Transferable interface represents an object that can be transfered between different execution contexts, like the main thread and Web workers.
trans-unit.target: 该 Transferable 接口表示可以在不同的执行上下文之间转移，像主线程和网络工作者的对象。

trans-unit.source: The TransitionEvent interface represents events providing information related to transitions.
trans-unit.target: 该 Transition Event 接口代表提供相关信息的事件转变。

trans-unit.source: The TransitionEvent() constructor returns a newly created TransitionEvent, representing an event in relation with an transition.
trans-unit.target: 所述 TransitionEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 TransitionEvent ，代表相对于与过渡的事件。

trans-unit.source: The TransitionEvent.elapsedTime read-only property is a float giving the amount of time the animation has been running, in seconds, when this event fired. This value is not affected by the transition-delay property.
trans-unit.target: 该 TransitionEvent.elapsedTime 只读属性是一个 float 给动画已经运行，在几秒钟内，当这一事件发射的时间量。此值不受 transition-delay 属性的影响。

trans-unit.source: The TransitionEvent.pseudoElement read-only property is a DOMString, starting with '::', containing the name of the pseudo-element the animation runs on. If the transition doesn't run on a pseudo-element but on the element, an empty string: ''.
trans-unit.target: 该 TransitionEvent.pseudoElement 只读属性是一个 DOMString ，从 '::' ，包含的名字伪元素的动画运行。如果过渡不是在伪元素上而是在元素上进行，则为空字符串： '' .

trans-unit.source: The TransitionEvent.transitionName read-only property is a DOMString containing the name of the CSS property associated with the transition.
trans-unit.target: 该 TransitionEvent.transitionName 只读属性是一个 DOMString 含有与过渡有关的CSS属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The TreeWalker.currentNode property represents the Node on which the TreeWalker is currently pointing at.
trans-unit.target: 该 TreeWalker.currentNode 属性表示 Node 上的 TreeWalker 目前指向。

trans-unit.source: The TreeWalker.expandEntityReferences read-only property returns a Boolean flag indicating whether or not the children of entity reference nodes are visible to the TreeWalker.
trans-unit.target: 该 TreeWalker.expandEntityReferences 只读属性返回 Boolean 标志指示是否实体引用节点的孩子是可见 TreeWalker 。

trans-unit.source: The TreeWalker.root read-only property returns the node that is the root of what the TreeWalker traverses.
trans-unit.target: 该 TreeWalker.root 只读属性返回什么TreeWalker横梁的根目录的节点。

trans-unit.source: The TreeWalker.whatToShow read-only property returns an unsigned long being a bitmask made of constants describing the types of Node that must to be presented. Non-matching nodes are skipped, but their children may be included, if relevant. The possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 该 TreeWalker.whatToShow 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long 正在作出描述类型的常量的位掩码 Node 必须要呈现。不匹配的节点将被跳过，但如果相关，则可包括其子节点。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: The UIEvent.isChar read-only property returns a Boolean indicating whether the event produced a key character or not.
trans-unit.target: 所述 UIEvent.isChar 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 指示事件是否产生的键字或没有。

trans-unit.source: The URL() constructor returns a newly created URL object representing the URL defined by the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 的 URL() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 URL 表示由所述参数定义的URL对象。

trans-unit.source: The URL read-only property of the Document interface returns the document location as a string.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 URL 只读属性将文档位置作为字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: The URL.origin read-only property returns a USVString containing the Unicode serialization of the origin of the represented URL, that is:
trans-unit.target: 该 URL .origin 只读属性返回 USVString 包含代表URL的起源，这是的Unicode序列：

trans-unit.source: The URLSearchParams() constructor creates and returns a new URLSearchParams object. Leading '?' characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLSearchParams() 构造函数创建并返回一个新 URLSearchParams 对象。前导 '?' 字符被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The URLSearchParams.entries() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all key/value pairs contained in this object. The key and value of each pair are USVString objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 URLSearchParams.entries() 方法返回的 iterator 允许经过包含在该对象中的所有键/值对。每对的键和值是 USVString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The URLSearchParams.keys() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all keys contained in this object. The keys are USVString objects.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLSearchParams.keys() 方法返回一个 iterator ，允许通过所有按键包含在此对象。键是 USVString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The URLSearchParams.sort() method sort all key/value pairs contained in this object in place and return undefined. The sort order is according to Unicode code points of the keys. This method uses a stable sorting algorithm (i.e. the relative order between key/value pairs with equal keys will be preserved).
trans-unit.target: 该 URLSearchParams.sort() 方法排序包含的所有键/值对这个对象的地方，回报 undefined 。排序顺序取决于键的Unicode代码点。此方法使用稳定的排序算法（即，将保留具有相等键的键/值对之间的相对顺序）。

trans-unit.source: The URLSearchParams.values() method returns an iterator allowing to go through all values contained in this object. The values are USVString objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 URLSearchParams.values() 方法返回的 iterator 允许经过所有的值包含在该对象。值是 USVString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.hash read-only property returns a DOMString containing a '#' followed by the fragment identifier of the URL. The hash is not percent encoded.
trans-unit.target: 所述 URLUtilsReadOnly .hash 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 含有 '#' 随后由URL的片段标识符。哈希未进行百分比编码。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.host read-only property returns a DOMString containing the host, that is the hostname, a ':', and the port of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLUtilsReadOnly .host 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 包含主机，即主机名，一个 ':' 和端口的URL。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.hostname read-only property returns a DOMString containing the domain of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLUtilsReadOnly .hostname 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 包含URL的域。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.href read-only property returns a DOMString containing the whole URL.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLUtilsReadOnly .href 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 包含整个URL。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.origin read-only property is a DOMString containing the Unicode serialization of the origin of the represented URL, that is, for http and https, the scheme followed by '://', followed by the domain, followed by ':', followed by the port (the default port, 80 and 443 respectively, if explicitely specified). For URL using file: scheme, the value is browser dependant.
trans-unit.target: 所述 URLUtilsReadOnly .origin 只读属性是一个 DOMString 包含表示URL的起源，即，用于http和https的Unicode序列，该方案后跟 '://' ，其次是结构域，随后 ':' ，后跟端口（如果明确指定，则默认端口分别为 80 和 443 ）。对于使用 file: scheme的URL ，该值取决于浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.pathname read-only property returns a DOMString containing an initial '/' followed by the path of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 所述 URLUtilsReadOnly .pathname 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 包含初始 '/' ，接着由该URL的路径。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.port read-only property returns a DOMString containing the port number of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLUtilsReadOnly .port 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 包含URL的端口号。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.protocol read-only property returns a DOMString containing the protocol scheme of the URL, including the final ':'.
trans-unit.target: 所述 URLUtilsReadOnly .protocol 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 包含URL的协议方案，包括最后 ':' 。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.search read-only property returns a DOMString containing a '?' followed by the parameters of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 该 URLUtilsReadOnly .search 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 包含一个 '?' 随后是URL的参数。

trans-unit.source: The URLUtilsReadOnly.toString() stringifier method returns a DOMString containing the whole URL. It is a synonym for URLUtilsReadOnly.href.
trans-unit.target: 所述 URLUtilsReadOnly .toString() stringifier方法返回 DOMString 包含整个URL。它是 URLUtilsReadOnly.href 的同义词。

trans-unit.source: The VTTCue() constructor returns a new VTTCue object.
trans-unit.target: 该 VTTCue() 构造函数返回一个新的 VTTCue 对象。

trans-unit.source: The VideoPlaybackQuality interface represents the set of metrics describing the playback quality of a video.
trans-unit.target: 所述 VideoPlaybackQuality 接口表示集合描述视频的回放质量度量。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_color_buffer_float extension is part of the WebGL API and adds the ability to render to 32-bit floating-point color buffers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_color_buffer_float 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并增加了渲染到32位浮点颜色缓冲器的能力。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_astc extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes Adaptive Scalable Texture Compression (ASTC) compressed texture formats to WebGL.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_compressed_texture_astc 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API和暴露的适应可缩放纹理压缩（ASTC）压缩纹理格式的WebGL。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_atc extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes 3 ATC compressed texture formats. ATC is a proprietary compression algorithm for compressing textures on handheld devices.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_compressed_texture_atc 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并暴露3种ATC压缩纹理格式。ATC是专有的压缩算法，用于压缩手持设备上的纹理。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_etc1 extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes the ETC1 compressed texture format.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_compressed_texture_etc1 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并暴露ETC1压缩纹理格式。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_etc extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes 10 ETC/EAC compressed texture formats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_compressed_texture_etc 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并暴露10 ETC / EAC压缩纹理格式。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes four PVRTC compressed texture formats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并暴露4种PVRTC压缩纹理格式。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes four S3TC compressed texture formats.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并暴露4种S3TC压缩纹理格式。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc_srgb extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes four S3TC compressed texture formats for the sRGB colorspace.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc_srgb 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并暴露4种S3TC压缩纹理格式为sRGB颜色空间中。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_debug_renderer_info extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes two constants with information about the graphics driver for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 该 WEBGL_debug_renderer_info 扩展的一部分WebGL的API，并公开了两个常量与有关调试目的的显卡驱动程序的信息。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_debug_shaders.getTranslatedShaderSource() method is part of the WebGL API and allows you to debug a translated shader.
trans-unit.target: 该 WEBGL_debug_shaders.getTranslatedShaderSource() 方法是的一部分WebGL的API，并允许您调试翻译着色器。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_debug_shaders extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes a method to debug shaders from privileged contexts.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_debug_shaders 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并暴露到从特权上下文调试着色器的方法。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_depth_texture extension is part of the WebGL API and defines 2D depth and depth-stencil textures.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_depth_texture 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API并限定2D深度和深度模版纹理。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_draw_buffers.drawBuffersWEBGL() method is part of the WebGL API and allows you to define the draw buffers to which all fragment colors are written.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_draw_buffers.drawBuffersWEBGL() 方法是的一部分的WebGL API和允许定义，这是所有片段的颜色被写入绘制缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The WEBGL_draw_buffers extension is part of the WebGL API and enables a fragment shader to write to several textures, which is useful for deferred shading, for example.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WEBGL_draw_buffers 扩展是的一部分的WebGL API，并且使得片段着色器来写入到几个纹理，这是有用的延期着色，例如。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL2RenderingContext.clientWaitSync() method of the WebGL 2 API blocks and waits for a WebGLSync object to become signaled or a given timeout to be passed.
trans-unit.target: WebGL 2 API的 WebGL2RenderingContext.clientWaitSync() 方法将阻止并等待 WebGLSync 对象发出信号或传递给定的超时。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL2RenderingContext.createQuery() method of the WebGL 2 API creates and initializes WebGLQuery objects, which provide ways to asynchronously query for information.
trans-unit.target: WebGL 2 API的 WebGL2RenderingContext.createQuery() 方法创建并初始化 WebGLQuery 对象，这些对象提供了异步查询信息的方法。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL2RenderingContext.createSampler() method of the WebGL 2 API creates and initializes WebGLSampler objects.
trans-unit.target: WebGL 2 API的 WebGL2RenderingContext.createSampler() 方法创建并初始化 WebGLSampler 对象。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL2RenderingContext.createTransformFeedback() method of the WebGL 2 API creates and initializes WebGLTransformFeedback objects.
trans-unit.target: WebGL 2 API的 WebGL2RenderingContext.createTransformFeedback() 方法创建并初始化 WebGLTransformFeedback 对象。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL2RenderingContext.fenceSync() method of the WebGL 2 API creates a new WebGLSync object and inserts it into the GL command stream.
trans-unit.target: WebGL 2 API的 WebGL2RenderingContext.fenceSync() 方法创建一个新的 WebGLSync 对象，并将其插入到GL命令流中。

trans-unit.source: The WebGL2RenderingContext.waitSync() method of the WebGL 2 API returns immediately, but waits on the GL server until the given WebGLSync object is signaled.
trans-unit.target: WebGL 2 API的 WebGL2RenderingContext.waitSync() 方法立即返回，但是在GL服务器上等待，直到发出给定 WebGLSync 对象的信号。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLProgram is part of the WebGL API and is a combination of two compiled WebGLShaders consisting of a vertex shader and a fragment shader (both written in GLSL). To create a WebGLProgram, call the GL context's createProgram() function. After attaching the shader programs using attachShader(), you link them into a usable program. This is shown in the code below.
trans-unit.target: 该 WebGLProgram 是的一部分的WebGL API和编译是两种的组合 WebGLShader 小号由顶点着色器和片段着色器（都写在GLSL）的。要创建 WebGLProgram ，请调用GL上下文的 createProgram() 函数。使用 attachShader() 附加着色器程序后，将它们链接到可用程序。这在下面的代码中显示。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.canvas property is a read-only reference to the HTMLCanvasElement or OffscreenCanvas object that is associated with the context. It might be null if it is not associated with a <canvas> element or an OffscreenCanvas object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.canvas 属性是只读参照 HTMLCanvasElement 或 OffscreenCanvas 与该上下文相关联的对象。如果它不与 <canvas> 元素或 OffscreenCanvas 对象关联，则它可能为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.getContextAttributes() method returns a WebGLContextAttributes object that contains the actual context parameters. Might return null, if the context is lost.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.getContextAttributes() 方法返回一个 WebGLContextAttributes 对象，其中包含实际的上下文参数。如果上下文丢失，则可能返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.getExtension() method enables a WebGL extension.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.getExtension() 方法使WebGL的扩展。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.getSupportedExtensions() method returns a list of all the supported WebGL extensions.
trans-unit.target: 该 WebGLRenderingContext.getSupportedExtensions() 方法返回所有受支持的名单WebGL的扩展。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.isContextLost() method returns a Boolean indicating whether or not the WebGL context has been lost.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext.isContextLost() 方法返回一个 Boolean 指示WebGL的上下文是否已丢失。

trans-unit.source: The WebGLRenderingContext.commit() method pushes frames back to the original HTMLCanvasElement, if the context is not directly fixed to a specific canvas.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WebGLRenderingContext .commit() 方法推帧回到原来 HTMLCanvasElement ，如果上下文没有直接固定到特定的画布。

trans-unit.source: The WebSocket() constructor returns a new WebSocket object.
trans-unit.target: 该 WebSocket() 构造函数返回一个新 WebSocket 对象。

trans-unit.source: The WheelEvent() constructor returns a newly created WheelEvent object.
trans-unit.target: 该 WheelEvent() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 WheelEvent 对象。

trans-unit.source: The WheelEvent.deltaMode read-only property returns an unsigned long representing the unit of the delta values scroll amount. Permitted values are:
trans-unit.target: 所述 WheelEvent.deltaMode 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long 表示增量值滚动量的单位。允许的值为：

trans-unit.source: The WheelEvent.deltaX read-only property is a double representing the horizontal scroll amount in the WheelEvent.deltaMode unit.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WheelEvent.deltaX 只读属性是一个 double 表示在水平滚动量 WheelEvent.deltaMode 单元。

trans-unit.source: The WheelEvent.deltaY read-only property is a double representing the vertical scroll amount in the WheelEvent.deltaMode unit.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WheelEvent.deltaY 只读属性是一个 double 代表在垂直滚动量 WheelEvent.deltaMode 单元。

trans-unit.source: The WheelEvent.deltaZ read-only property is a double representing the scroll amount along the z-axis, in the WheelEvent.deltaMode unit.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WheelEvent.deltaZ 只读属性是一个 double 表示沿z轴的滚动量，在 WheelEvent.deltaMode 单元。

trans-unit.source: The Window.close() method closes the current window, or the window on which it was called.
trans-unit.target: 的 Window.close() 方法关闭当前窗口，或在其上被称为窗口。

trans-unit.source: The Window.confirm() method displays a modal dialog with an optional message and two buttons, OK and Cancel.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Window.confirm() 方法显示模态对话框与一个可选的消息和两个按钮，OK和Cancel。

trans-unit.source: The Window.onbeforeinstallprompt property is an event handler for processing a beforeinstallprompt, which is dispatched on devices when a user is about to be prompted to "install" a web application. Its associated event may be saved for later and used to prompt the user at a more suitable time.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.onbeforeinstallprompt 属性是处理的事件处理程序 beforeinstallprompt ，这是在设备调度当用户将被提示“安装” Web应用程序。它的关联事件可以保存下来，以便以后使用，并在更合适的时间提示用户。

trans-unit.source: The Window.screenLeft read-only property returns the horizontal distance, in CSS pixels, from the left border of the user's browser viewport to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.screenLeft 只读属性返回的水平距离，在CSS像素，从用户的浏览器窗口的左边框到屏幕的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The Window.screenTop read-only property returns the vertical distance, in CSS pixels, from the top border of the user's browser viewport to the top side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.screenTop 只读属性返回的垂直距离，在CSS像素，从用户的浏览器窗口到屏幕的上侧的上边框。

trans-unit.source: The Window.screenX read-only property returns the horizontal distance, in CSS pixels, of the left border of the user's browser viewport to the left side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.screenX 只读属性返回的水平距离，在CSS像素，用户的浏览器窗口的左边框的屏幕的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The Window.screenY read-only property returns the vertical distance, in CSS pixels, of the top border of the user's browser viewport to the top edge of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.screenY 只读属性返回的垂直距离，在CSS像素，用户的浏览器窗口的上边框与屏幕的顶部边缘。

trans-unit.source: The Window.self read-only property returns the window itself, as a WindowProxy. It can be used with dot notation on a window object (that is, window.self) or standalone (self). The advantage of the standalone notation is that a similar notation exists for non-window contexts, such as in Web Workers. By using self, you can refer to the global scope in a way that will work not only in a window context (self will resolve to window.self) but also in a worker context (self will then resolve to WorkerGlobalScope.self).
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.self 只读属性返回窗口本身，作为一个 WindowProxy 。它可以与 window 对象（即 window.self ）或独立对象（ self ）上的点符号一起使用。独立表示法的优点在于，对于非窗口上下文（例如在 Web Workers 中)也存在类似的表示法。通过使用 self ，您可以以一种不仅在窗口上下文中（ self 将解析为 window.self ）而且在worker上下文中（ self 将解析为 WorkerGlobalScope.self ）工作的方式引用全局范围。

trans-unit.source: The Window.history read-only property returns a reference to the History object, which provides an interface for manipulating the browser session history (pages visited in the tab or frame that the current page is loaded in).
trans-unit.target: 该 Window.history 只读属性返回对 History 对象的引用，该对象提供用于处理浏览器会话历史记录的界面（在当前页面所加载的标签页或框架中访问的页面）。

trans-unit.source: The WindowEventHandlers.onbeforeunload event handler property contains the code executed when the beforeunload is sent. This event fires when a window is about to unload its resources. The document is still visible and the event is still cancelable.
trans-unit.target: 该 WindowEventHandlers.onbeforeunload 事件处理程序属性包含当执行的代码 beforeunload 发送。当窗口即将 unload 其资源时，将触发此事件。该文档仍然可见，该事件仍然可以取消。

trans-unit.source: The WindowEventHandlers.onlanguagechange event handler is a property containing the code to execute when the languagechange event, of type Event, is received by the object implementing this interface, usually a Window, an HTMLBodyElement, or an HTMLIFrameElement. Such an event is sent by the browser to inform that the preferred languages list has been updated. The list is accessible via NavigatorLanguage.languages.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WindowEventHandlers.onlanguagechange 事件处理程序是包含的代码，当执行一个属性 languagechange 事件，类型的 Event ，是由实现该接口，通常是一个物体接收到的 Window ，一个 HTMLBodyElement 或 HTMLIFrameElement 。这种事件由浏览器发送，以通知首选语言列表已更新。可通过 NavigatorLanguage.languages 访问该列表。

trans-unit.source: The WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.btoa() method creates a base-64 encoded ASCII string from a String object in which each character in the string is treated as a byte of binary data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.btoa() 方法创建从一个base-64编码的ASCII字符串 String ，其中该字符串中的每个字符都被当作二进制数据的字节对象。

trans-unit.source: The Worker() constructor creates a Worker object that executes the script at the specified URL. This script must obey the same-origin policy.
trans-unit.target: 该 Worker() 构造函数创建一个 Worker ，在指定的URL执行脚本的对象。该脚本必须遵守同源策略。

trans-unit.source: The WorkerGlobalScope interface of the Web Workers API is an interface representing the scope of any worker. Workers have no browsing context; this scope contains the information usually conveyed by Window objects — in this case event handlers, the console or the associated WorkerNavigator object. Each WorkerGlobalScope has its own event loop.
trans-unit.target: Web Workers API的 WorkerGlobalScope 接口是代表任何worker范围的接口。工作人员没有浏览上下文；此作用域包含通常由 Window 对象传达的信息，在这种情况下为事件处理程序，控制台或关联的 WorkerNavigator 对象。每个 WorkerGlobalScope 都有自己的事件循环。

trans-unit.source: The WorkerNavigator.connection read-only property returns a NetworkInformation object containing information about the system's connection, such as the current bandwidth of the user's device or whether the connection is metered. This could be used to select high definition content or low definition content based on the user's connection.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WorkerNavigator.connection 只读属性返回一个 NetworkInformation 包含关于系统的连接的信息，对象，例如用户的设备的当前带宽或是否连接被计量。这可用于根据用户的连接选择高清晰度内容或低清晰度内容。

trans-unit.source: The WorkerNavigator.permissions read-only property returns a Permissions object that can be used to query and update permission status of APIs covered by the Permissions API.
trans-unit.target: 该 WorkerNavigator.permissions 只读属性返回一个 Permissions 可用于通过覆盖的API的查询和更新许可状态对象权限的API。

trans-unit.source: The WorkerNavigator interface represents a subset of the Navigator interface allowed to be accessed from a Worker. Such an object is initialized for each worker and is available via the WorkerGlobalScope.navigator property obtained by calling window.self.navigator.
trans-unit.target: 所述 WorkerNavigator 接口表示的子集 Navigator 允许从一个访问接口 Worker 。为每个工作程序初始化这样的对象，并且可以通过调用 window.self.navigator 获得的 WorkerGlobalScope.navigator 属性来使用此对象。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest() constructor creates a new XMLHttpRequest.
trans-unit.target: 在 XMLHttpRequest() 构造函数创建一个新 XMLHttpRequest 。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest.abort() method aborts the request if it has already been sent. When a request is aborted, its readyState is changed to XMLHttpRequest.UNSENT (0) and the request's status code is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 所述 XMLHttpRequest.abort() 方法，如果中止已经发送它的请求。当请求中止时，其 readyState 更改为 XMLHttpRequest.UNSENT （0），并且请求的 status 码设置为0。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest.timeout property is an unsigned long representing the number of milliseconds a request can take before automatically being terminated. The default value is 0, which means there is no timeout. Timeout shouldn't be used for synchronous XMLHttpRequests requests used in a document environment or it will throw an InvalidAccessError exception. When a timeout happens, a timeout event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 所述 XMLHttpRequest.timeout 属性是一个 unsigned long 表示毫秒的请求可以前自动采取被终止的数量。默认值为0，表示没有超时。超时不应用于文档环境中使用的同步XMLHttpRequests请求，否则它将引发 InvalidAccessError 异常。发生超时时，将触发超时事件。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequest.withCredentials property is a Boolean that indicates whether or not cross-site Access-Control requests should be made using credentials such as cookies, authorization headers or TLS client certificates. Setting withCredentials has no effect on same-site requests.
trans-unit.target: 该 XMLHttpRequest.withCredentials 属性是一个 Boolean ，指示是否不跨站 Access-Control 要求应使用的凭证，如饼干，授权标题或TLS客户端证书进行。设置 withCredentials 不会影响同一站点的请求。

trans-unit.source: The XMLHttpRequestResponseType type is an enumerated set of strings which are used to specify the type of data contained in the response of an XMLHttpRequest. These values are used when getting or setting the responseType on the request.
trans-unit.target: 所述 XMLHttpRequestResponseType 类型是一个枚举一套用于指定包含在数据的种类的字符串的 response 的的 XMLHttpRequest 的。在获取或设置请求的 responseType 时使用这些值。

trans-unit.source: The abort() method of the SourceBuffer interface aborts the current segment and resets the segment parser.
trans-unit.target: SourceBuffer 接口的 abort() 方法将中止当前段并重置段解析器。

trans-unit.source: The abort() method of the Web Speech API stops the speech recognition service from listening to incoming audio, and doesn't attempt to return a SpeechRecognitionResult.
trans-unit.target: Web Speech API的 abort() 方法停止语音识别服务侦听传入的音频，并且不尝试返回 SpeechRecognitionResult 。

trans-unit.source: The activeSourceBuffers read-only property of the MediaSource interface returns a SourceBufferList object containing a subset of the SourceBuffer objects contained within sourceBuffers — the list of objects providing the selected video track, enabled audio tracks, and shown/hidden text tracks.
trans-unit.target: 所述 activeSourceBuffers 只读的属性 MediaSource 的接口返回一个 SourceBufferList 包含的子集对象 SourceBuffer 对象包含在 sourceBuffers -提供所选择的视频轨道的对象的列表，使能音频轨道，并且显示/隐藏文本轨道。

trans-unit.source: The activeWorker read-only property of the InstallEvent interface returns the ServiceWorker that is currently actively controlling the page.
trans-unit.target: InstallEvent 接口的 activeWorker 只读属性返回当前正在主动控制页面的 ServiceWorker 。

trans-unit.source: The add() method of the DOMTokenList interface adds the given token to the list.
trans-unit.target: DOMTokenList 接口的 add() 方法将给定令牌添加到列表中。

trans-unit.source: The addFromString() method of the SpeechGrammarList interface takes a grammar present in a specific DOMString within the code base (e.g. stored in a variable) and adds it to the SpeechGrammarList as a new SpeechGrammar object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 addFromString() 的方法 SpeechGrammarList 接口需要存在于一个特定的语法 DOMString 代码库中（例如存储在一个变量），并将其添加到 SpeechGrammarList 作为新 SpeechGrammar 对象。

trans-unit.source: The addFromURI() method of the SpeechGrammarList interface takes a grammar present at a specific URI and adds it to the SpeechGrammarList as a new SpeechGrammar object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 addFromURI() 的方法 SpeechGrammarList 接口取本语法在一个特定的URI，并将其添加到 SpeechGrammarList 作为新 SpeechGrammar 对象。

trans-unit.source: The addListener() method of the MediaQueryList interface adds a listener to the MediaQueryListener that will run a custom callback function in response to the media query status changing.
trans-unit.target: 该 addListener() 的方法 MediaQueryList 接口添加一个侦听到 MediaQueryListener 将在回应媒体查询状态改变运行一个自定义的回调函数。

trans-unit.source: The addModule() method of the Worklet interface loads the module in the given JavaScript file and adds it to the current Worklet.
trans-unit.target: Worklet 接口的 addModule() 方法将模块加载到给定的JavaScript文件中，并将其添加到当前的 Worklet 中。

trans-unit.source: The addSourceBuffer() method of the MediaSource interface creates a new SourceBuffer of the given MIME type and adds it to the MediaSource's sourceBuffers list. The new SourceBuffer is also returned.
trans-unit.target: MediaSource 接口的 addSourceBuffer() 方法创建给定MIME类型的新 SourceBuffer 并将其添加到 MediaSource 的 sourceBuffers 列表中。还返回新的 SourceBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: The append() method of the FormData interface appends a new value onto an existing key inside a FormData object, or adds the key if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: FormData 接口的 append() 方法将新值添加到 FormData 对象内部的现有键上，或者添加该键（如果尚不存在）。

trans-unit.source: The appendBuffer() method of the SourceBuffer interface appends media segment data from an ArrayBuffer or ArrayBufferView object to the SourceBuffer.
trans-unit.target: SourceBuffer 接口的 appendBuffer() 方法将媒体段数据从 ArrayBuffer 或 ArrayBufferView 对象追加到 SourceBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: The appendStream() method of the SourceBuffer interface appends media segment data from a ReadableStream object to the SourceBuffer.
trans-unit.target: SourceBuffer 接口的 appendStream() 方法将媒体段数据从 ReadableStream 对象追加到 SourceBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: The appendWindowEnd property of the SourceBuffer interface controls the timestamp for the end of the append window, a timestamp range that can be used to filter what media data is appended to the SourceBuffer. Coded media frames with timestamps wthin this range will be appended, whereas those outside the range will be filtered out.
trans-unit.target: SourceBuffer 接口的 appendWindowEnd 属性控制附加窗口结束时的时间戳，该时间戳范围可用于过滤将哪些媒体数据附加到 SourceBuffer 。带有时间戳的编码媒体帧将超出此范围，而超出范围的那些将被滤除。

trans-unit.source: The appendWindowStart property of the SourceBuffer interface controls the timestamp for the start of the append window, a timestamp range that can be used to filter what media data is appended to the SourceBuffer. Coded media frames with timestamps wthin this range will be appended, whereas those outside the range will be filtered out.
trans-unit.target: SourceBuffer 接口的 appendWindowStart 属性控制附加窗口开始的时间戳，该时间戳范围可用于过滤将哪些媒体数据附加到 SourceBuffer 。带有时间戳的编码媒体帧将超出此范围，而超出范围的那些将被滤除。

trans-unit.source: The applicationCache read-only property of the SharedWorkerGlobalScope interface returns the ApplicationCache object for the worker (see Using the application cache).
trans-unit.target: SharedWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 applicationCache 只读属性返回工作 ApplicationCache 对象（请参阅使用应用程序缓存）。

trans-unit.source: The applyConstraints() method of the MediaStreamTrack interface applies a set of constraints to the track; these constraints let the Web site or app establish ideal values and acceptable ranges of values for the constrainable properties of the track, such as frame rate, dimensions, echo cancelation, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: MediaStreamTrack 接口的 applyConstraints () 方法将一组约束应用于该轨道；这些限制使网站或应用可以为轨道的可约束属性（例如帧频，尺寸，回声消除等）建立理想值和可接受的值范围。

trans-unit.source: The arrayBuffer()method of the PushMessageData interface extracts push message data as an ArrayBuffer object.
trans-unit.target: PushMessageData 接口的 arrayBuffer() 方法将推送消息数据提取为 ArrayBuffer 对象。

trans-unit.source: The audioTracks read-only property of the SourceBuffer interface returns a list of the audio tracks currently contained inside the SourceBuffer.
trans-unit.target: SourceBuffer 接口的 audioTracks 只读属性返回当前包含在 SourceBuffer 中的音轨列表。

trans-unit.source: The blob()method of the PushMessageData interface extracts push message data as a Blob object.
trans-unit.target: PushMessageData 接口的 blob() 方法将推送消息数据提取为 Blob 对象。

trans-unit.source: The blockedURI read-only property of the SecurityPolicyViolationEvent interface is a USVString representing the URI of the resource that was blocked because it violates a policy.
trans-unit.target: SecurityPolicyViolationEvent 接口的 blockedURI 只读属性是一个 USVString ,它表示由于违反策略而被阻止的资源的URI。

trans-unit.source: The bottom read-only property of the DOMRectReadOnly interface returns the bottom coordinate value of the DOMRect. (Has the same value as y + height, or y if height is negative.)
trans-unit.target: DOMRectReadOnly 接口的 bottom 只读属性返回DOMRect的底部坐标值 DOMRect. （具有与 y + height 相同的值，如果 height 为负，则为 y 。）

trans-unit.source: The buffer property of the AudioBufferSourceNode interface provides the ability to play back audio using an AudioBuffer as the source of the sound data.
trans-unit.target: AudioBufferSourceNode 接口的 buffer 属性提供了使用 AudioBuffer 作为声音数据源播放音频的功能。

trans-unit.source: The buffered read-only property of the SourceBuffer interface returns the time ranges that are currently buffered in the SourceBuffer as a normalized TimeRanges object.
trans-unit.target: SourceBuffer 接口的 buffered 只读属性返回当前在 SourceBuffer 中作为规范化 TimeRanges 对象缓冲的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: The byteStreamTrackID read-only property of the TrackDefault interface returns the ID of the specific track that the SourceBuffer should apply to.
trans-unit.target: TrackDefault 接口的 byteStreamTrackID 只读属性返回 SourceBuffer 应该应用于的特定轨道的ID 。

trans-unit.source: The caches read-only property of the WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope interface returns the CacheStorage object associated with the current context. This object enables functionality such as storing assets for offline use, and generating custom responses to requests.
trans-unit.target: WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 caches 只读属性返回与当前上下文关联的 CacheStorage 对象。此对象启用功能，例如存储资产以供脱机使用，以及生成对请求的自定义响应。

trans-unit.source: The cancel() method of the SpeechSynthesis interface removes all utterances from the utterance queue.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesis 接口的 cancel() 方法从发声队列中删除所有发声。

trans-unit.source: The cancelAnimationFrame() method of the VRDisplay interface is a special implementation of Window.cancelAnimationFrame that unregisters callbacks registered with VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame().
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 接口的 cancelAnimationFrame() 方法是 Window.cancelAnimationFrame 的一种特殊实现， VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame() 注册通过VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame（）注册的回调。

trans-unit.source: The clientId read-only property of the FetchEvent returns the id of the Client that the current service worker is controlling.
trans-unit.target: FetchEvent 的 clientId 只读属性返回当前服务工作者正在控制的 Client 的ID 。

trans-unit.source: The close() method of the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope interface discards any tasks queued in the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope's event loop, effectively closing this particular scope.
trans-unit.target: DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 close() 方法将丢弃 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope 事件循环中排队的所有任务，从而有效关闭此特定范围。

trans-unit.source: The close() method of the EventSource interface closes the connection, if one is made, and sets the EventSource.readyState attribute to 2 (closed).
trans-unit.target: 如果建立了连接， EventSource 接口的 close() 方法将关闭连接，并将 EventSource.readyState 属性设置为 2 （关闭）。

trans-unit.source: The close() method of the MessagePort interface disconnects the port, so it is no longer active. This stops the flow of messages to that port.
trans-unit.target: MessagePort 接口的 close() 方法断开端口的连接，因此该端口不再处于活动状态。这将停止到该端口的消息流。

trans-unit.source: The close() method of the SharedWorkerGlobalScope interface discards any tasks queued in the SharedWorkerGlobalScope's event loop, effectively closing this particular scope.
trans-unit.target: SharedWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 close() 方法丢弃在 SharedWorkerGlobalScope 的事件循环中排队的所有任务，从而有效地关闭此特定范围。

trans-unit.source: The columnNumber read-only property of the SecurityPolicyViolationEvent interface is the column number in the document or worker at which the violation occurred.
trans-unit.target: SecurityPolicyViolationEvent 接口的 columnNumber 只读属性是发生违规的文档或工作程序中的列号。

trans-unit.source: The composite property of a KeyframeEffect resolves how an element's animation impacts its underlying property values.
trans-unit.target: KeyframeEffect 的 composite 属性可解决元素的动画如何影响其基础属性值的情况。

trans-unit.source: The confidence read-only property of the SpeechRecognitionResult interface returns a numeric estimate of how confident the speech recognition system is that the recognition is correct.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognitionResult 接口的 confidence 只读属性返回一个数字估计值，该数字估计值是语音识别系统对识别正确性的置信度。

trans-unit.source: The contains() method of the DOMTokenList interface returns a Boolean — true if the underlying list contains the given token, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: DOMTokenList 接口的 contains() 方法返回一个 Boolean — 如果基础列表包含给定标记，则返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The createImageBitmap() method creates a bitmap from a given source, optionally cropped to contain only a portion of that source. The method exists on the global scope in both windows and workers. It accepts a variety of different image sources, and returns a Promise which resolves to an ImageBitmap.
trans-unit.target: 所述 createImageBitmap() 方法创建来自给定源的位图，任选裁剪为仅包含源的一部分。该方法在Windows和Worker中都存在于全局范围内。它接受各种不同的图像源，并返回解析为 ImageBitmap 的 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: The cssText property of the CSSValue interface represents the current computed CSS property value.
trans-unit.target: CSSValue 接口的 cssText 属性表示当前计算出的CSS属性值。

trans-unit.source: The cssValueType read-only property of the CSSValue interface represents the type of the current computed CSS property value.
trans-unit.target: CSSValue 接口的 cssValueType 只读属性表示当前计算出的CSS属性值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The data read-only property of the CompositionEvent interface returns the characters generated by the input method that raised the event; its exact nature varies depending on the type of event that generated the CompositionEvent object.
trans-unit.target: CompositionEvent 接口的 data 只读属性返回引发事件的输入方法生成的字符；它的确切性质取决于生成 CompositionEvent 对象的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: The dataset property on the HTMLElement interface provides read/write access to all the custom data attributes (data-*) set on the element. This access is available both in HTML and within the DOM. It is a map of DOMString, one entry for each custom data attribute. Note that thedatasetproperty itself can be read, but not directly written. Instead, all writes must be to the individual properties within the dataset, which in turn represent the data attributes. Note also that an HTML data-attribute and its corresponding DOMdataset.property do not share the same name, but they are always similar:
trans-unit.target: 的 dataset 的属性上 HTMLElement 接口提供读/所有写访问自定义数据属性（ data-* ）在元素上设置。此访问权限在HTML和DOM中均可用。它是DOMString的映射，每个自定义数据属性一个条目。请注意， dataset 属性本身可以读取，但不能直接写入。相反，所有写操作都必须针对 dataset 内的各个属性，这些属性又代表数据属性。还要注意，HTML data- 属性及其对应的DOM dataset. 属性 不会使用相同的名称，但是它们总是相似的：

trans-unit.source: The define() method of the CustomElementRegistry interface defines a new custom element.
trans-unit.target: CustomElementRegistry 接口的 define() 方法定义一个新的自定义元素。

trans-unit.source: The delete() method of the FormData interface deletes a key and its value(s) from a FormData object.
trans-unit.target: FormData 接口的 delete() 方法从 FormData 对象中删除键及其值。

trans-unit.source: The delete() method of the CacheStorage interface finds the Cache object matching the cacheName, and if found, deletes the Cache object and returns a Promise that resolves to true. If no Cache object is found, it returns false.
trans-unit.target: CacheStorage 接口的 delete () 方法查找与 cacheName 匹配的 Cache 对象，如果找到，则删除 Cache 对象并返回解析为 true 的 Promise 。如果未找到 Cache 对象，则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The depthFar property of the VRDisplay interface gets and sets the z-depth defining the far plane of the eye view frustum, i.e. the furthest viewable boundary of the scene.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 界面的 depthFar 属性获取并设置z深度，该深度定义了视锥台的远平面，即场景的最远可视边界。

trans-unit.source: The depthNear property of the VRDisplay interface gets and sets the z-depth defining the near plane of the eye view frustum, i.e. the nearest viewable boundary of the scene.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 界面的 depthNear 属性获取并设置z深度，该深度定义了视锥台的近平面，即场景的最近可见边界。

trans-unit.source: The detail readonly property of the CustomEvent interface returns any data passed when initializing the event.
trans-unit.target: CustomEvent 接口的 detail 只读属性返回初始化事件时传递的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: The disposition read-only property of the SecurityPolicyViolationEvent interface indicates how the violated policy is configured to be treated by the user agent.
trans-unit.target: SecurityPolicyViolationEvent 接口的 disposition 只读属性指示用户代理如何配置违反策略。

trans-unit.source: The documentURI property of the Document interface returns the document location as a string.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 documentURI 属性以字符串形式返回文档位置。

trans-unit.source: The documentURI read-only property of the SecurityPolicyViolationEvent interface is a USVString representing the URI of the document or worker in which the violation was found.
trans-unit.target: SecurityPolicyViolationEvent 接口的 documentURI 只读属性是 USVString ,表示在其中发现违规的文档或工作程序的URI。

trans-unit.source: The duration property of the MediaSource interface gets and sets the duration of the current media being presented.
trans-unit.target: MediaSource 接口的 duration 属性获取并设置要显示的当前媒体的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The effectiveDirective read-only property of the SecurityPolicyViolationEvent interface is a DOMString representing the directive whose enforcement uncovered the violation.
trans-unit.target: SecurityPolicyViolationEvent 接口的 effectiveDirective directive 只读属性是一个 DOMString ,表示其强制执行发现了违规的指令。

trans-unit.source: The endOfStream() method of the MediaSource interface signals the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: MediaSource 接口的 endOfStream() 方法向流的结尾发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint read-only property of the PushSubscription interface returns a USVString containing the endpoint associated with the push subscription.
trans-unit.target: PushSubscription 接口的 endpoint 只读属性返回一个 USVString ,其中包含与推送订阅关联的终结点。

trans-unit.source: The exitPresent() method of the VRDisplay interface stops the VRDisplay presenting a scene.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 接口的 exitPresent() 方法停止 VRDisplay 呈现场景。

trans-unit.source: The extendableEvent.waitUntil() method tells the event dispatcher that work is ongoing. It can also be used to detect whether that work was successful. In service workers, waitUntil() tells the browser that work is ongoing until the promise settles, and it shouldn't terminate the service worker if it wants that work to complete.
trans-unit.target: 该 extendableEvent.waitUntil() 方法告诉事件分派的工作正在进行中。它也可以用来检测该工作是否成功。在服务人员中， waitUntil() 告知浏览器工作正在进行中，直到承诺达成为止，并且如果希望完成该工作，则不应终止服务人员。

trans-unit.source: The fetch() method of the WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope mixin starts the process of fetching a resource from the network. This returns a promise that resolves to the Response object representing the response to your request. The promise does not reject on HTTP errors — instead it only rejects only network errors; then handlers must check for HTTP errors.
trans-unit.target: WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope mixin 的 fetch() 方法开始从网络中获取资源的过程。这将返回一个承诺，该承诺将解析为代表对您的请求的响应的 Response 对象。Promise 不会拒绝HTTP错误，而是仅拒绝网络错误。 then 处理程序必须检查HTTP错误。

trans-unit.source: The frameType read-only property of the Client interface indicates the type of browsing context of the current Client. This value can be one of auxiliary, top-level, nested, or none.
trans-unit.target: Client 接口的 frameType 只读属性指示当前 Client 的浏览上下文的类型。该值可以是 auxiliary 值， top-level ， nested 或 none 之一。

trans-unit.source: The get() method of the CustomElementRegistry interface returns the constructor for a previously-defined custom element.
trans-unit.target: CustomElementRegistry 接口的 get() 方法返回先前定义的自定义元素的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The get() method of the FormData interface returns the first value associated with a given key from within a FormData object. If you expect multiple values and want all of them, use the getAll() method instead.
trans-unit.target: FormData 接口的 get() 方法从 FormData 对象中返回与给定键关联的第一个值。如果期望多个值并需要所有值，请改用 getAll() 方法。

trans-unit.source: The get() method of the Clients interface gets a service worker client matching a given id and returns it in a Promise.
trans-unit.target: Clients 接口的 get () 方法获取与给定 id 匹配的服务工作者客户端，并将其返回到 Promise 中。

trans-unit.source: The getAll() method of the FormData interface returns all the values associated with a given key from within a FormData object.
trans-unit.target: FormData 接口的 getAll() 方法从 FormData 对象中返回与给定键关联的所有值。

trans-unit.source: The getCounterValue() method of the CSSPrimitiveValue interface is used to get the counter value. If this CSS value doesn't contain a counter value, a DOMException is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the Counter interface.
trans-unit.target: CSSPrimitiveValue 接口的 getCounterValue() 方法用于获取计数器值。如果此CSS值不包含计数器值，则会引发 DOMException 。可以使用 Counter 接口对相应的style属性进行修改。

trans-unit.source: The getEyeParameters() method of the VRDisplay interface returns the VREyeParameters object containing the eye parameters for the specified eye.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 接口的 getEyeParameters() 方法返回 VREyeParameters 对象，该对象包含指定眼睛的眼睛参数。

trans-unit.source: The getFloatValue() method of the CSSPrimitiveValue interface is used to get a float value in a specified unit. If this CSS value doesn't contain a float value or can't be converted into the specified unit, a DOMException is raised.
trans-unit.target: CSSPrimitiveValue 接口的 getFloatValue() 方法用于获取指定单位的浮点值。如果此CSS值不包含浮点值或无法转换为指定的单位，则会引发 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: The getFrameData() method of the VRDisplay interface accepts a VRFrameData object and populates it with the information required to render the current frame.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplay 接口的 getFrameData() 方法接受一个 VRFrameData 对象，并使用呈现当前帧所需的信息填充该对象。

trans-unit.source: The getImmediatePose() method of the VRDisplay interface returns a VRPose object defining the current pose of the VRDisplay, with no prediction applied.
