trans-unit.source: The HTMLIsIndexElement interface provides special properties (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating <isindex> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLIsIndexElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出常规 HTMLElement 用于操纵接口它还具有通过继承提供给它） <isindex> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLIElement interface exposes specific properties and methods (beyond those defined by regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating list elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLLIElement 接口暴露特定的属性和方法（除了那些由常规定义 HTMLElement 用于操纵列表元素接口它还具有通过继承提供给它）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLabelElement.htmlFor property reflects the value of the for content property. That means that this script-accessible property is used to set and read the value of the content property for, which is the ID of the label's associated control element.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLLabelElement.htmlFor 属性反映的价值 for 内容属性。这意味着，该脚本访问的属性是用来设置和读取内容属性的值 for ，这是该品牌的相关控制元素的ID。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLabelElement interface gives access to properties specific to <label> elements. It inherits methods and properties from the base HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLLabelElement 接口可以访问属性特定于 <label> 元素。它从基本 HTMLElement 接口继承方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLegendElement is an interface allowing to access properties of the <legend> elements. It inherits properties and methods from the HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLLegendElement 是允许对的访问属性的接口 <legend> 元素。它从 HTMLElement 接口继承属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLLinkElement interface represents reference information for external resources and the relationship of those resources to a document and vice-versa. This object inherits all of the properties and methods of the HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLLinkElement 接口表示对外部资源的参考信息和这些资源的一个文档，并且反之亦然的关系。该对象继承了 HTMLElement 接口的所有属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMapElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond those of the regular object HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of map elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMapElement 接口提供特殊的属性和方法（超出正常对象的 HTMLElement 用于操纵地图元素的布局和呈现接口它还具有提供给它通过继承）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMarqueeElement interface provides methods to manipulate <marquee> elements. It inherits properties and methods from the HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMarqueeElement 接口提供方法来操作 <marquee> 元素。它从 HTMLElement 接口继承属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.autoplay property reflects the autoplay HTML attribute, indicating whether playback should automatically begin as soon as enough media is available to do so without interruption.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.autoplay 属性反映 autoplay HTML属性，指示是否为足够的介质可不间断地这样做回放就应自动开始。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.buffered read-only property returns a new TimeRanges object that indicates the ranges of the media source that the browser has buffered (if any) at the moment the buffered property is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.buffered 只读属性返回一个新 TimeRanges 对象指示所述媒体源的范围，该浏览器已缓冲的（如果有的话）在此刻 buffered 属性被访问。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.canPlayType() method determines whether the specified media type can be played back.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.canPlayType() 方法确定指定的媒体类型是否可被重放。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.controller property represents the media controller assigned to the element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.controller 属性表示指定给所述元素媒体控制器。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.controls property reflects the controls HTML attribute, which controls whether user interface controls for playing the media item will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.controls 属性反映 controls 的HTML属性，该属性控制是否为播放媒体项目的用户界面控件将被显示出来。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.crossOrigin property is the CORS setting for this image element. See CORS settings attributes for details.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.crossOrigin 属性是CORS设定此图像元素。有关详细信息，请参见CORS设置属性。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.currentSrc property contains the absolute URL of the chosen media resource. This could happen, for example, if the web server selects a media file based on the resolution of the user's display. The value is an empty string if the networkState property is EMPTY.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.currentSrc 属性包含所选择的媒体资源的绝对URL。例如，如果Web服务器基于用户显示的分辨率选择媒体文件，则可能会发生这种情况。如果 networkState 属性为 EMPTY ,则该值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.currentTime property gives the current playback time in seconds. Setting this value seeks the media to the new time.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.currentTime 属性提供以秒为当前播放时间。设置此值可将媒体搜索到新的时间。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.defaultMuted property reflects the muted HTML attribute, which indicates whether the media element's audio output should be muted by default. This property has no dynamic effect. To mute and unmute the audio output, use the muted property.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.defaultMuted 属性反映 muted HTML属性，这表明无论是媒体元素的音频输出默认情况下应静音。此属性没有动态效果。要使音频输出静音和取消静音，请使用 muted 属性。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.defaultPlaybackRate property indicates the default playback rate for the media.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.defaultPlaybackRate 属性表示媒体的默认播放速率。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.disableRemotePlayback property determines whether the media element is allowed to have a remote playback UI.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.disableRemotePlayback 属性确定媒体元素是否被允许具有远程重放UI。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.duration property gives the length of the media in seconds, or zero if no media data is available.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.duration 属性给出的介质的长度在几秒钟内，或者如果没有媒体数据可用零。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.ended indicates whether the media element has ended playback.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.ended 表示媒体元素是否已经结束播放。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.error is the MediaError object for the most recent error, or null if there has not been an error. When an error event is received by the element, you can determine details about what happened by examining this object.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.error 是 MediaError 最近一个错误的对象，或者 null ，如果没有发生过的错误。当元素接收到 error 事件时，可以通过检查此对象来确定有关发生的事件的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.fastSeek() method quickly seeks the media to the new time with precision tradeoff.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.fastSeek() 方法快速寻求媒体向新的时间精确权衡。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.initialTime is the initial playback position in seconds. This property is obsolete, you can use a Media Fragments URI in the HTMLMediaElement.src attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.initialTime 是以秒计的初始重放位置。该属性已过时，您可以在 HTMLMediaElement.src 属性中使用Media Fragments URI。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.loop property reflects the loop HTML attribute, which controls whether the media element should start over when it reaches the end.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.loop 属性反映 loop HTML属性，它控制是否当它到达终点媒体元素应该重新开始。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.mediaGroup property reflects the mediagroup HTML attribute, which indicates the name of the group of elements it belongs to. A group of media elements shares a common controller.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.mediaGroup 属性反映 mediagroup HTML属性，它表示该组元素属于的名称。一组媒体元素共享一个公共 controller 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.muted indicates whether the media element muted.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.muted 表示媒体元素是否静音。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.networkState property indicates the current state of the fetching of media over the network.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.networkState 属性指示的媒体在网络上抓取的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.pause() method will pause playback of the media, if the media is already in a paused state this method will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.pause() 方法将暂停播放媒体，如果媒体已经处于暂停状态该方法将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.playbackRate property sets the rate at which the media is being played back. This is used to implement user controls for fast forward, slow motion, and so forth. The normal playback rate is multiplied by this value to obtain the current rate, so a value of 1.0 indicates normal speed.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.playbackRate 属性设置在该媒体正在播放的速度。这用于实现快进，慢动作等用户控件。正常播放速率乘以该值可获得当前速率，因此值1.0表示正常速度。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.readyState property indicates the readiness state of the media.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.readyState 属性指示媒体的就绪状态。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.setSinkId() method sets the ID of the audio device to use for output and returns a Promise. This only works when the application is authorized to use the specified device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.setSinkId() 方法设置所述音频装置的ID来使用的输出，并返回一个 Promise 。仅当授权该应用程序使用指定设备时，此方法才有效。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.sinkId read-only property returns a DOMString that is the unique ID of the audio device delivering output. If it is using the user agent default, it returns an empty string. This ID should be one of the MediaDeviceInfo.deviceId values returned from MediaDevices.enumerateDevices(), id-multimedia, or id-communications.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMediaElement.sinkId 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 即音频设备输出传送的唯一ID。如果使用的是默认用户代理，则返回空字符串。此ID应该是从 MediaDevices.enumerateDevices() ， id-multimedia 或 id-communications 返回的 MediaDeviceInfo.deviceId 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.src property reflects the value of the HTML media element's src attribute, which indicates the URL of a media resource to use in the element.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.src 属性反映HTML媒体元素的值 src 属性，它表示元素使用的媒体资源的URL。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement.volume property sets the volume at which the media will be played.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement.volume 属性设置在该媒体将播放音量。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMediaElement interface adds to HTMLElement the properties and methods needed to support basic media-related capabilities that are common to audio and video. The HTMLVideoElement and HTMLAudioElement elements both inherit this interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLMediaElement 接口添加到 HTMLElement 的属性，并支持中常见的音频和视频基本媒体相关的功能都需要的方法。该 HTMLVideoElement 和 HTMLAudioElement 元素都继承这个接口。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLMetaElement interface contains descriptive metadata about a document. It inherits all of the properties and methods described in the HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLMetaElement 接口包含关于文档的描述性元数据。它继承了 HTMLElement 接口中描述的所有属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLModElement interface provides special properties (beyond the regular methods and properties available through the HTMLElement interface they also have available to them by inheritance) for manipulating modification elements, that is <del> and <ins>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLModElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出可用常规方法和属性通过 HTMLElement 的用于操纵修改元件接口它们还具有通过继承提供给他们），即 <del> 和 <ins> 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLOListElement interface provides special properties (beyond those defined on the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating ordered list elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLOListElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出在常规定义的 HTMLElement 的接口，还具有通过继承提供给它），用于操纵有序列表元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLObjectElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond those on the HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of <object> element, representing external resources.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLObjectElement 接口提供特殊的属性和方法（除了那些在 HTMLElement 的用于操纵的布局和呈现接口它还具有提供给它通过继承） <object> 元素，代表外部资源。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLOptGroupElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement object interface they also have available to them by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of <optgroup> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLOptGroupElement 接口提供特殊的属性和方法（超出常规 HTMLElement 用于操纵的布局和展现对象接口他们也有提供给他们通过继承） <optgroup> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLOptionElement interface represents <option> elements and inherits all classes and methods of the HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLOptionElement 接口表示 <option> 元素和继承所有类和方法 HTMLElement 接口。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLOutputElement interface provides properties and methods (beyond those inherited from HTMLElement) for manipulating the layout and presentation of <output> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLOutputElement 接口提供的属性和方法（除了那些来自继承 HTMLElement ），用于操纵的布局和呈现 <output> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLParagraphElement interface provides special properties (beyond those of the regular HTMLElement object interface it inherits) for manipulating <p> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLParagraphElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出常规的 HTMLElement 对象接口它继承），用于操纵 <p> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLParamElement interface provides special properties (beyond those of the regular HTMLElement object interface it inherits) for manipulating <param> elements, representing a pair of a key and a value that acts as a parameter for an <object> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLParamElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出常规的 HTMLElement 对象接口它继承），用于操纵 <param> 元素，表示对的密钥的以及用作用于一个参数的值 <object> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLPreElement interface expose specific properties and methods (beyond those defined by regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating block of preformatted text.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLPreElement 接口暴露特定的属性和方法（除了那些由常规定义 HTMLElement 用于操纵预格式文本的块接口它还具有通过继承提供给它）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLProgressElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of <progress> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLProgressElement 接口提供特殊的属性和方法（超出常规 HTMLElement 用于操纵的布局和呈现接口它还具有通过继承提供给它） <progress> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLQuoteElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating quoting elements, like <blockquote> and <q>, but not the <cite> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLQuoteElement 接口提供特殊的属性和方法（超出常规 HTMLElement 用于操纵引述元件接口它还具有提供给它通过继承），如 <blockquote> 和 <q> ，而不是 <cite> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSlotElement interface of the Shadow DOM API enables access to the name and assigned nodes of an HTML <slot> element.
trans-unit.target: Shadow DOM API的 HTMLSlotElement 接口允许访问HTML <slot> 元素的名称和分配的节点。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSourceElement interface provides special properties (beyond the regular HTMLElement object interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating <source> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSourceElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出常规 HTMLElement 用于操纵对象接口它还具有通过继承提供给它） <source> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLSpanElement interface represents a <span> element and derives from the HTMLElement interface, but without implementing any additional properties or methods.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLSpanElement 接口表示 <span> 元素，并导出来自 HTMLElement 的界面，但没有实现任何额外的属性或方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLStyleElement.media property specifies the intended destination medium for style information.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLStyleElement.media 属性指定样式信息预期的目标媒体。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLStyleElement.type read-only property returns the type of the current style.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLStyleElement.type 只读属性返回当前样式的类型。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLStyleElement interface represents a <style> element. It inherits properties and methods from its parent, HTMLElement, and from LinkStyle.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLStyleElement 接口表示 <style> 元素。它从其父 LinkStyle HTMLElement 和LinkStyle继承属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableCaptionElement interface special properties (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating table caption elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableCaptionElement 接口的特殊性能（超出普通 HTMLElement 的接口，还具有通过继承提供给它），用于操纵表格标题元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableCellElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of table cells, either header or data cells, in an HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableCellElement 接口提供特殊的属性和方法（超出常规 HTMLElement 用于操纵布局和表单元格的表示，无论是标头或数据单元，在HTML文档中接口它还具有提供给它通过继承）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableColElement interface provides special properties (beyond the HTMLElement interface it also has available to it inheritance) for manipulating single or grouped table column elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableColElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出 HTMLElement 用于操纵单个或分组表列元素接口它还具有提供给它继承）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.align property represents the alignment of the table.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement.align 属性表示该表的排列。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.bgcolor property represents the background color of the table.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement.bgcolor 属性表示该表的背景颜色。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.caption property represents the table caption. If no caption element is associated with the table, it can be null.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement.caption 属性表示表格标题。如果没有标题元素与表关联，则可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.deleteCaption() method removes the caption from the table. If there is no caption associated with the table, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.deleteCaption() 方法从表中删除的标题。如果没有与该表关联的标题，则此方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.insertRow() method inserts a new row in the table and returns a reference to the new row.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.insertRow() 方法插入在表中，并返回到新的行的引用的新行。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.rules property represents which cell borders to render in the table.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement.rules 物业表示单元格边框的表格来呈现。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement.tFoot property represents the table's <tfoot> element. Its value can be null if there is no such element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableElement.tFoot 属性表示该表的 <tfoot> 元素。如果没有这样的元素，其值可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement object interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of tables in an HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableElement 接口提供了特殊的属性和方法（超出普通 HTMLElement 的HTML文档中的操作表的布局和演示文稿对象接口，它也有通过继承提供给它）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableRowElement.insertCell() method inserts a new cell into a table row and returns a reference to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTableRowElement.insertCell() 方法插入一个新的小区到一个表行，并返回到单元格的引用。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableRowElement.rowIndex property represents the position of a row in relation to the whole table.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableRowElement.rowIndex 属性表示一个行相对于整个表中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableRowElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of rows in an HTML table.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableRowElement 接口提供了特殊的属性和方法（超出 HTMLElement 在HTML表格操作行的布局和外观界面，也有提供给它的继承）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTableSectionElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of sections, that is headers, footers and bodies, in an HTML table.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTableSectionElement 接口提供了特殊的属性和方法（超出 HTMLElement 的操控部分的布局和演示，也就是页眉，页脚和机构，在HTML表格接口还具有提供给它的继承）。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTextAreaElement interface provides special properties and methods for manipulating the layout and presentation of <textarea> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTextAreaElement 接口提供特殊性能以及用于操纵的布局和表示方法 <textarea> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTimeElement interface provides special properties (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating <time> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTimeElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出常规 HTMLElement 用于操纵接口它还具有通过继承提供给它） <time> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTitleElement interface contains the title for a document. This element inherits all of the properties and methods of the HTMLElement interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTitleElement 接口包含标题为一个文件。该元素继承 HTMLElement 接口的所有属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTrackElement.src property reflects the value of the <track> element's src attribute, which indicates the URL of the text track's data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLTrackElement.src 属性反映的值 <track> 元素的 src 属性，它指示文本轨道的数据的URL。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLTrackElement
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLTrackElement

trans-unit.source: The HTMLUListElement interface provides special properties (beyond those defined on the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating unordered list elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLUListElement 接口提供特殊性能（超出在常规定义的 HTMLElement 的接口，还具有通过继承提供给它），用于操纵无序列表元素。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLUnknownElement interface represents an invalid HTML element and derives from the HTMLElement interface, but without implementing any additional properties or methods.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTMLUnknownElement 接口表示一个无效的HTML元素和导出从 HTMLElement 的界面，但没有实现任何额外的属性或方法。

trans-unit.source: The HTMLVideoElement interface provides special properties and methods for manipulating video objects. It also inherits properties and methods of HTMLMediaElement and HTMLElement.
trans-unit.target: 该 HTMLVideoElement 接口提供了操作的视频对象的特殊属性和方法。它还继承了 HTMLMediaElement 和 HTMLElement 的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The Headers interface of the Fetch API allows you to perform various actions on HTTP request and response headers. These actions include retrieving, setting, adding to, and removing. A Headers object has an associated header list, which is initially empty and consists of zero or more name and value pairs. You can add to this using methods like append() (see Examples.) In all methods of this interface, header names are matched by case-insensitive byte sequence.
trans-unit.target: Fetch API的标 Headers 接口允许您对HTTP请求和响应标头执行各种操作。这些操作包括检索，设置，添加和删除。甲 Headers 对象具有相关联的报头列表，它最初是空的，并且由零个或多个名称和值对。您可以使用诸如 append() 之类的方法添加此内容（请参见示例。）在此接口的所有方法中，标头名称均按不区分大小写的字节序列进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: The History interface allows manipulation of the browser session history, that is the pages visited in the tab or frame that the current page is loaded in.
trans-unit.target: 在 History 接口允许浏览器的操作会话历史，那就是在标签或帧当前页面在加载访问过的网页。

trans-unit.source: The IDBCursor interface of the IndexedDB API represents a cursor for traversing or iterating over multiple records in a database.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBCursor 接口表示一个游标，用于遍历或迭代数据库中的多个记录。

trans-unit.source: The IDBCursorSync interface of the IndexedDB API represents a cursor for iterating over multiple records in a database. You can have only one instance of IDBCursorSync representing a cursor, but you can have an unlimited number of cursors at the same time. Operations are performed on the underlying index or object store. It enables an application to synchronously process all the records in the cursor's range.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBCursorSync 接口表示用于遍历数据库中多个记录的游标。您只能有一个 IDBCursorSync 实例代表一个光标，但同时可以有无限多个光标。在基础索引或对象存储上执行操作。它使应用程序能够同步处理游标范围内的所有记录。

trans-unit.source: The IDBCursorWithValue interface of the IndexedDB API represents a cursor for traversing or iterating over multiple records in a database. It is the same as the IDBCursor, except that it includes the value property.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBCursorWithValue 接口表示一个游标，用于遍历或迭代数据库中的多个记录。它与 IDBCursor 相同，区别在于它包含 value 属性。

trans-unit.source: The IDBDatabase interface of the IndexedDB API provides a connection to a database; you can use an IDBDatabase object to open a transaction on your database then create, manipulate, and delete objects (data) in that database. The interface provides the only way to get and manage versions of the database.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API 的 IDBDatabase 接口提供了与数据库的连接；您可以使用 IDBDatabase 对象在数据库上打开事务，然后在该数据库中创建，操作和删除对象（数据）。该界面提供了获取和管理数据库版本的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: The IDBEnvironment helper of the IndexedDB API contains the indexedDB property, which provides access to IndexedDB functionality. It is the top level IndexedDB interface implemented by the window and Worker objects.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBEnvironment 帮助程序包含 indexedDB 属性，该属性提供对IndexedDB功能的访问。它是由 window 和 Worker 对象实现的顶级IndexedDB接口。

trans-unit.source: The IDBFactory interface of the IndexedDB API lets applications asynchronously access the indexed databases. The object that implements the interface is window.indexedDB. You open — that is, create and access — and delete a database with this object, and not directly with IDBFactory.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBFactory 接口使应用程序可以异步访问索引数据库。实现该接口的对象是 window.indexedDB 。您使用该对象而不是直接使用 IDBFactory 打开（即创建和访问）并删除数据库。

trans-unit.source: The IDBFactorySync interface of the IndexedDB API provide a synchronous means of accessing the capabilities of indexed databases.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBFactorySync 接口提供了一种访问索引数据库功能的同步方式。

trans-unit.source: The IDBIndexSync interface of the IndexedDB API provides synchronous access to an index in a database.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBIndexSync 接口提供对数据库中索引的同步访问。

trans-unit.source: The IDBKeyRange interface of the IndexedDB API represents a continuous interval over some data type that is used for keys. Records can be retrieved from IDBObjectStore and IDBIndex objects using keys or a range of keys. You can limit the range using lower and upper bounds. For example, you can iterate over all values of a key in the value range A–Z.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBKeyRange 接口表示用于键的某些数据类型上的连续间隔。可以使用键或键范围从 IDBObjectStore 和 IDBIndex 对象检索记录。您可以使用上下限来限制范围。例如，您可以遍历键值范围A–Z中的所有值。

trans-unit.source: The IDBLocaleAwareKeyRange interface of the IndexedDB API is a Firefox-specific version of IDBKeyRange — it functions in exactly the same fashion, and has the same properties and methods, but it is intended for use with IDBIndex objects when the original index had a locale value specified upon its creation (see createIndex()'s optionalParameters) — that is, it has locale aware sorting enabled.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBLocaleAwareKeyRange 接口是 IDBKeyRange 的特定于Firefox的版本—其功能完全相同，并具有相同的属性和方法，但是当原始索引具有指定的 locale 值时，它旨在与 IDBIndex 对象一起使用创建后（请参见 createIndex() 的optionalParameters）—也就是说，它启用了区域感知的排序。

trans-unit.source: The IDBObjectStore interface of the IndexedDB API represents an object store in a database. Records within an object store are sorted according to their keys. This sorting enables fast insertion, look-up, and ordered retrieval.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBObjectStore 接口表示数据库中的对象存储。对象存储中的记录根据其键进行排序。这种排序可以实现快速插入，查找和有序检索。

trans-unit.source: The IDBObjectStoreSync interface of the IndexedDB API provides synchronous access to an object store of a database.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBObjectStoreSync 接口提供对数据库对象存储的同步访问。

trans-unit.source: The IDBOpenDBRequest interface of the IndexedDB API provides access to the results of requests to open or delete databases (performed using IDBFactory.open and IDBFactory.deleteDatabase), using specific event handler attributes.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API 的 IDBOpenDBRequest 接口使用特定的事件处理程序属性，提供对打开或删除数据库的请求结果的访问（使用 IDBFactory.open 和 IDBFactory.deleteDatabase 执行）。

trans-unit.source: The IDBRequest interface of the IndexedDB API provides access to results of asynchronous requests to databases and database objects using event handler attributes. Each reading and writing operation on a database is done using a request.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API 的 IDBRequest 接口使用事件处理程序属性提供对数据库和数据库对象的异步请求结果的访问。使用请求完成数据库上的每个读写操作。

trans-unit.source: The IDBTransaction.error property of the IDBTransaction interface returns one of several types of error when there is an unsuccessful transaction.
trans-unit.target: 当事务不成功时， IDBTransaction 接口的 IDBTransaction.error 属性返回几种错误类型之一。

trans-unit.source: The IDBTransaction interface of the IndexedDB API provides a static, asynchronous transaction on a database using event handler attributes. All reading and writing of data is done within transactions. You actually use IDBDatabase to start transactions and IDBTransaction to set the mode of the transaction (e.g. is it readonly or readwrite), and access an IDBObjectStore to make a request. You can also use it to abort transactions.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBTransaction 接口使用事件处理程序属性在数据库上提供静态，异步事务。所有数据的读取和写入都在事务内完成。实际上，您使用 IDBDatabase 启动事务，并使用 IDBTransaction 设置事务模式（例如，它是 readonly 还是 readwrite ），并访问 IDBObjectStore 进行请求。您也可以使用它来中止事务。

trans-unit.source: The IDBTransactionSync interface of the IndexedDB API provides a synchronous transaction on a database. When an application creates an IDBTransactionSync object, it blocks until the browser is able to reserve the require database objects.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBTransactionSync 接口在数据库上提供同步事务。当应用程序创建IDBTransactionSync对象时，它将阻塞，直到浏览器能够保留必需的数据库对象为止。

trans-unit.source: The IDBVersionChangeEvent interface indicates that the version of the database has changed, as the result of an IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded event handler function.
trans-unit.target: 该 IDBVersionChangeEvent 接口指示该数据库的版本已经改变，作为一个结果 IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded 事件处理函数。

trans-unit.source: The IDBVersionChangeEvent interface of the IndexedDB API indicates that the version of the database has changed, as the result of an IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded event handler function.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBVersionChangeEvent 接口指示由于 IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded 事件处理函数的结果，数据库的版本已更改。

trans-unit.source: The IDBVersionChangeRequest.setVersion method updates the version of the database, returning immediately and running a versionchange transaction on the connected database in a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 该 IDBVersionChangeRequest.setVersion 方法更新数据库的版本，立即返回和运行 versionchange 在一个单独的线程连接的数据库上的事务。

trans-unit.source: The IDBVersionChangeRequest interface the IndexedDB API represents a request to change the version of a database. It is used only by the setVersion() method of IDBDatabase.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API的 IDBVersionChangeRequest 接口表示更改数据库版本的请求。它仅由 IDBDatabase 的 setVersion() 方法使用。

trans-unit.source: The IIRFilterNode() constructor of the Web Audio API creates a new IIRFilterNode object which an AudioNode processor which implements a general infinite impulse response filter.
trans-unit.target: Web音频API的 IIRFilterNode() 构造函数创建一个新的 IIRFilterNode 对象，该对象 AudioNode 处理器实现通用的无限冲激响应滤波器。

trans-unit.source: The IIRFilterNode interface of the Web Audio API is an AudioNode processor that implements a general infinite impulse response (IIR) filter; this type of filter can be used to implement tone control devices and graphic equalizers, and the filter response parameters can be specified, so that it can be tuned as needed. This article looks at how to implement one, and use it in a simple example.
trans-unit.target: Web音频API的 IIRFilterNode 接口是一个 AudioNode 处理器，它实现通用的无限冲激响应（IIR）过滤器；这种类型的滤波器可用于实现音调控制设备和图形均衡器，并且可以指定滤波器响应参数，以便可以根据需要对其进行调整。本文研究如何实现它，并在一个简单的示例中使用它。

trans-unit.source: The IIRFilterNode interface of the Web Audio API is a AudioNode processor which implements a general infinite impulse response (IIR) filter; this type of filter can be used to implement tone control devices and graphic equalizers as well. It lets the parameters of the filter response be specified, so that it can be tuned as needed.
trans-unit.target: Web Audio API的 IIRFilterNode 接口是一个 AudioNode 处理器，它实现了通用的无限冲激响应（IIR）过滤器；这种类型的滤波器还可用于实现音调控制设备和图形均衡器。它可以指定过滤器响应的参数，以便可以根据需要进行调整。

trans-unit.source: The IdleDeadline interface is used as the data type of the input parameter to idle callbacks established by calling Window.requestIdleCallback(). It offers a method, timeRemaining(), which lets you determine how much longer the user agent estimates it will remain idle and a property, didTimeout, which lets you determine if your callback is executing because its timeout duration expired.
trans-unit.target: 所述 IdleDeadline 接口用作输入参数到空闲回调调用建立的数据类型 Window.requestIdleCallback() 。它提供了 timeRemaining() 方法，该方法使您可以确定用户代理估计其将保持空闲状态的时间，以及属性 didTimeout ，该属性可以使您确定由于超时时间已过而使回调是否正在执行。

trans-unit.source: The Image() constructor creates a new HTMLImageElement instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 Image() 构造函数创建一个新的 HTMLImageElement 实例。

trans-unit.source: The Image() constructor, taking two optional unsignedlongs, which are the width and the height of the resource, creates an instance of HTMLImageElement , not inserted in a DOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 的 Image() 的构造，以两个可选的 unsigned long s，这是宽度和资源的高度，将创建的实例 HTMLImageElement ，在DOM树中不插入。

trans-unit.source: The ImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap() method displays the given ImageBitmap in the canvas associated with this rendering context. The ownership of the ImageBitmap is transferred to the canvas as well.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap() 方法显示给定 ImageBitmap 与此渲染上下文相关联的画布。 ImageBitmap 的所有权也转移到画布上。

trans-unit.source: The ImageBitmapRenderingContext interface is a canvas rendering context that provides the functionality to replace the canvas's contents with the given ImageBitmap. Its context id (the first argument to HTMLCanvasElement.getContext() or OffscreenCanvas.getContext()) is "bitmaprenderer".
trans-unit.target: 该 ImageBitmapRenderingContext 接口是提供的功能与给定的更换画布的内容的画布渲染上下文 ImageBitmap 。它的上下文ID（ HTMLCanvasElement.getContext() 或 OffscreenCanvas.getContext() 的第一个参数）是 "bitmaprenderer" 。

trans-unit.source: The ImageCapture interface of the MediaStream Image Capture API provides methods to enable the capture of images or photos from a camera or other photographic deviceprovides an interface for capturing images from a photographic device referenced through a valid MediaStreamTrack.
trans-unit.target: MediaStream Image Capture API的 ImageCapture 接口提供了用于从相机或其他照相设备捕获图像或照片的方法，并提供了一个接口，用于从通过有效 MediaStreamTrack 引用的照相设备捕获图像。

trans-unit.source: The ImageData object
trans-unit.target: 该 ImageData 对象

trans-unit.source: The InputDeviceCapabilities() constructor creates a new InputDeviceCapabilities object provides information about the physical device responsible for generating a touch event.
trans-unit.target: 所述 InputDeviceCapabilities() 构造函数创建一个新 InputDeviceCapabilities 对象提供有关负责产生的触摸事件的物理设备的信息。

trans-unit.source: The InputDeviceCapabilities.firesTouchEvents read-only property returns a Boolean that indicates whether the device dispatches touch events.
trans-unit.target: 该 InputDeviceCapabilities.firesTouchEvents 只读属性返回一个 Boolean ，指示设备是否调度触摸事件。

trans-unit.source: The InputDeviceCapabilities interface of the Input Device Capabilities API provides information about the physical device or a group of related devices responsible for generating input events. Events caused by the same physical input device get the same instance of this object, but the converse isn't true. For example, two mice with the same capabilities in a system may appear as a single InputDeviceCapabilities instance.
trans-unit.target: 输入设备功能API的 InputDeviceCapabilities 接口提供有关负责生成输入事件的物理设备或一组相关设备的信息。由相同的物理输入设备引起的事件将获得该对象的相同实例，但反之则不成立。例如，系统中具有相同功能的两只鼠标可能显示为单个 InputDeviceCapabilities 实例。

trans-unit.source: The InputEvent() constructor creates a new InputEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 InputEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 InputEvent 的。

trans-unit.source: The InputEvent interface represents an event notifying of editable content change.
trans-unit.target: 该 InputEvent 的接口表示可编辑的内容变化的事件通知。

trans-unit.source: The IntersectionObserver() constructor creates and returns a new IntersectionObserver object. The rootMargin, if specified, is checked to ensure it's syntactically correct, the thresholds are checked to ensure that they're all in the range 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive, and the threshold list is sorted in ascending numeric order. if the threshold list is empty, it's set to the array [0.0].
trans-unit.target: 该 IntersectionObserver() 构造函数创建并返回一个新 IntersectionObserver 对象。该 rootMargin ，如果指定，检查，以确保它的语法正确，阈值进行检查，以确保他们都在范围0.0和1.0以上，阈值列表在上升的数字顺序进行排序。如果阈值列表为空，则将其设置为数组[0.0]。

trans-unit.source: The IntersectionObserverEntry's target property specifies which Element previously targeted by calling IntersectionObserver.observe() experienced a change in intersection with the root.
trans-unit.target: 所述 IntersectionObserverEntry 的 target ，其属性指定 Element 先前通过调用目标 IntersectionObserver.observe() 经历在交点与根的变化。

trans-unit.source: The Keyboard interface of the the Keyboard API provides functions that retrieve keyboard layout maps and toggle capturing of key presses from the physical keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 该 Keyboard 的的接口键盘API提供了检索键盘布局图和切换从物理键盘捕获按键的功能。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent() constructor creates a new KeyboardEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent() 构造函数创建一个新 KeyboardEvent 。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.altKey read-only property is a Boolean indicates if the
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent.altKey 只读属性是一个 Boolean 表示，如果

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.code property represents a physical key on the keyboard (as opposed to the character generated by pressing the key). In other words, this property returns a value which isn't altered by keyboard layout or the state of the modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 所述 KeyboardEvent.code 属性表示在键盘上的物理键（而不是按键生成的字符）。换句话说，此属性返回的值不会因键盘布局或修饰键的状态而改变。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.ctrlKey read-only property returns a Boolean that indicates if the
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent.ctrlKey 只读属性返回一个 Boolean ，表示如果

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.metaKey read-only property returning a Boolean that indicates if the
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent.metaKey 只读返回属性 Boolean 表示，如果

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent.shiftKey read-only property indicates if the
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent.shiftKey 只读属性指示是否

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardEvent interface specification went through numerous draft versions, first under DOM Events Level 2 where it was dropped as no consensus arose, then under DOM Events Level 3. This led to the implementation of non-standard initialization methods, the early DOM Events Level 2 version, KeyboardEvent.initKeyEvent() by Gecko browsers and the early DOM Events Level 3 version, KeyboardEvent.initKeyboardEvent() by others. Both have been superseded by the modern usage of a constructor: KeyboardEvent().
trans-unit.target: 该 KeyboardEvent 接口规范经过无数次的草拟版本第2级去了，第一下DOM事件，3级。它被作为下跌没有达成共识，然后出现在DOM事件这导致了非标准初始化方法的实现，早期的DOM事件2级Gecko浏览器版本的 KeyboardEvent.initKeyEvent() 和其他DOM Events Level 3早期版本的 KeyboardEvent.initKeyboardEvent() 。两者都已被构造函数的现代用法所取代： KeyboardEvent() 。

trans-unit.source: The KeyboardLayoutMap interface of the the Keyboard API is a map-like object with functions for retrieving the string associated with specific physical keys. A list of valid keys is found in the UI Events KeyboardEvent code Values specification.
trans-unit.target: 所述 KeyboardLayoutMap 的所述的接口键盘API是一个地图状物体与用于检索与特定物理按键相关联的字符串的功能。在UI事件KeyboardEvent代码值规范中可以找到有效键的列表。

trans-unit.source: The KeyframeEffect() constructor of the Web Animations API returns a new KeyframeEffect object instance, and also allows you to clone an existing keyframe effect object instance.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 KeyframeEffect() 构造函数返回一个新的 KeyframeEffect 对象实例，并且还允许您克隆现有的关键帧效果对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The KeyframeEffect interface of the Web Animations API lets us create sets of animatable properties and values, called keyframes. These can then be played using the Animation() constructor.
trans-unit.target: Web Animations API的 KeyframeEffect 接口使我们可以创建可设置动画的属性和值集，称为关键帧。然后可以使用 Animation() 构造函数播放它们。

trans-unit.source: The L and R input channels are used for their non-surround respective output channels (L and R). Surround output channels (SL and SR) are silent.
trans-unit.target: 的 L 和 R 输入信道用于其非环绕各个输出信道（ L 和 R ）。环绕声输出通道（ SL 和 SR ）是静音的。

trans-unit.source: The L and R input channels are used for their non-surround respective output channels (L and R). Surround output channels (SL and SR), as well as the center (C) and subwoofer (LFE) channels, are left silent.
trans-unit.target: 的 L 和 R 输入信道用于其非环绕各个输出信道（ L 和 R ）。环绕声输出通道（ SL 和 SR ）以及中置（ C ）和低音炮（ LFE ）通道保持静音。

trans-unit.source: The L, R, SL, and SR input channels are used for their respective output channels (L and R). Center (C) and subwoofer (LFE) channels are left silent.
trans-unit.target: 的 L ， R ， SL 和 SR 的输入信道用于其各自的输出通道（ L 和 R ）。中置（ C ）和低音炮（ LFE ）声道保持静音。

trans-unit.source: The LinearAccelerationSensor constructor creates a new LinearAccelerationSensor object which provides on each reading the acceleration applied to the device along all three axes, but without the contribution of gravity.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LinearAccelerationSensor 构造函数创建一个新 LinearAccelerationSensor 对象，它提供在每个读取沿所有三个轴施加到装置的加速度，但没有重力的贡献。

trans-unit.source: The LinearAccelerationSensor interface of the Sensor APIs provides on each reading the acceleration applied to the device along all three axes, but without the contribution of gravity.
trans-unit.target: Sensor API的 LinearAccelerationSensor 接口在每次读取时都提供沿所有三个轴施加到设备的加速度，但没有重力的作用。

trans-unit.source: The LocalMediaStreaminterface was part of the Media Capture and Streams API, representing a stream of data being generated locally (such as by getUserMedia(). However, getUserMedia() now returns a MediaStream instead, and this interface has been removed from the specification.
trans-unit.target: 所述 LocalMediaStream 接口是的一部分媒体捕获和流API，代表在本地产生的数据流（例如，通过 getUserMedia() 。然而， getUserMedia() 现在返回一个 MediaStream 代替，并且该界面已经从本说明书中移除。

trans-unit.source: The Location interface represents the location (URL) of the object it is linked to. Changes done on it are reflected on the object it relates to. Both the Document and Window interface have such a linked Location, accessible via Document.location and Window.location respectively.
trans-unit.target: 的 Location 接口表示它被链接到对象的位置（URL）。对它所做的更改会反映在与其相关的对象上。这两个 Document 和 Window 界面有这样一个链接 Location 通过，进入 Document.location 和 Window.location 分别。

trans-unit.source: The Lock interface of the the Web Locks API provides the name and mode of a previously requested lock, which is received in the callback to LockManager.request().
trans-unit.target: Web Locks API的 Lock 接口提供了先前请求的锁的名称和模式，该锁的名称和模式在 LockManager.request() 的回调中接收到。

trans-unit.source: The LockManager interface of the the Web Locks API provides methods for requesting a new Lock object and querying for an existing Lock object. To get an instance of LockManager, call navigator.locks.
trans-unit.target: Web Locks API的 LockManager 接口提供了用于请求新 Lock 对象和查询现有 Lock 对象的方法。要获取 LockManager 的实例，请调用 navigator.locks 。

trans-unit.source: The LongRange dictionary is used to define a range of permitted integer values for a property, with either or both a maximum and minimum value specified. The ConstrainLongRange dictionary is based on this, augmenting it to support exact and ideal values as well.
trans-unit.target: 的 LongRange 辞典用于定义一个范围的允许整数一个属性值，其中任一或两者在最大和最小值确定。该 ConstrainLongRange 字典是在此基础上，增强其支持精确值与理想值也是如此。

trans-unit.source: The M input channel is used for both output channels (L and R).
trans-unit.target: 的 M 输入信道用于两个输出通道（ L 和 R ）。

trans-unit.source: The M input channel is used for non-surround output channels (L and R). Surround output channels (SL and SR) are silent.
trans-unit.target: 的 M 输入信道用于非环绕输出通道（ L 和 R ）。环绕声输出通道（ SL 和 SR ）是静音的。

trans-unit.source: The M input channel is used for the center output channel (C). All the others (L, R, LFE, SL, and SR) are silent.
trans-unit.target: 的 M 输入通道被用于中心信道输出（ C ）。所有其他参数（ L ， R ， LFE ， SL 和 SR ）都保持沉默。

trans-unit.source: The MIDIAccess interface of the Web MIDI API provides methods for listing MIDI input and output devices, and obtaining access to those devices.
trans-unit.target: Web MIDI API的 MIDIAccess 接口提供了列出MIDI输入和输出设备以及获得对这些设备的访问的方法。

trans-unit.source: The MIDIConnectionEvent interface of the Web MIDI API is the event passed to the onstatechange event of the MIDIAccess interface and the onstatechange event of the MIDIPorts interface. This occurs any time a new port becomes available, or when a previously available port becomes unavailable. For example, this event is fired whenever a MIDI device is either plugged in to or unplugged from a computer.
trans-unit.target: 该 MIDIConnectionEvent 的接口的Web MIDI API是传递给事件 onstatechange 的事件 MIDIAccess 接口和 onstatechange 的事件 MIDIPorts 接口。每当新端口可用时，或以前可用的端口不可用时，就会发生这种情况。例如，只要将MIDI设备插入计算机或从计算机上拔下，就会触发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The MIDIInputMap read-only interface of the Web MIDI API provides a Map-like interface to the currently available MIDI input ports. Though it works generally like a map, because it is read-only it does not contain clear(), delete(), or set() functions.
trans-unit.target: Web MIDI API的 MIDIInputMap 只读接口为当前可用的MIDI输入端口提供类似于 Map 的接口。尽管它通常像地图一样工作，但是因为它是只读的，所以它不包含 clear() ， delete() 或 set() 函数。

trans-unit.source: The MIDIOutputMap read-only interface of the Web MIDI API provides a Map-like interface to the currently available MIDI output ports. Although it works like a map, because it is read-only, it does not contain clear(), delete(), or set() functions.
trans-unit.target: Web MIDI API的 MIDIOutputMap 只读接口为当前可用的MIDI输出端口提供类似于 Map 的接口。尽管它像地图一样工作，但由于它是只读的，所以它不包含 clear() ， delete() 或 set() 函数。

trans-unit.source: The MSRangeCollection object is an array of one or more Range objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MSRangeCollection 对象是一个阵列或多个范围的物体。

trans-unit.source: The Magnetometer constructor creates a new Magnetometer object which returns information about the magnetic field as detected by a device’s primary magnetometer sensor.
trans-unit.target: 的 Magnetometer 构造函数创建一个新的 Magnetometer 由设备的主磁力计传感器检测它返回关于磁场信息对象。

trans-unit.source: The Magnetometer interface of the Sensor APIs provides information about the magnetic field as detected by the device’s primary magnetometer sensor.
trans-unit.target: 传感器API的 Magnetometer 接口提供有关设备的主磁力计传感器检测到的磁场的信息。

trans-unit.source: The Media.pause() method (part of the MediaRecorder API) is used to pause recording of media streams.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Media.pause() 方法（的一部分MediaRecorder API）用于暂停的媒体流的记录。

trans-unit.source: The MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() method, part of the Media Capabilities API, returns a promise with the tested media configuration's mediaCapabilitiesInfo; this contains the three Boolean properties supported, smooth, and powerefficient, which describe whether decoding the media described would be supported, smooth, and powerefficient.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() 的方法，所述的部分媒体能力API，返回与测试介质配置的一个承诺mediaCapabilitiesInfo ;其中包含三个布尔属性 supported ， smooth 和 powerefficient ，这三个属性描述了解码所描述的媒体是否将被支持，平滑和高效。

trans-unit.source: The MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() method, part of the MediaCapabilities interface of the Media Capabilities API, returns a promise with the tested media configuration's MediaCapabilitiesInfo; this contains the three Boolean properties supported, smooth, and powerefficient, which describe how compatible the device is with the type of media.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() 的方法，所述的部分 MediaCapabilities 界面处的媒体能力API，返回与测试介质配置的一个承诺 MediaCapabilitiesInfo ; 它包含三个 supported 布尔属性， smooth 和 powerefficient ，它们描述设备与媒体类型的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The MediaCapabilitiesInfo interface contains three Boolean attribues:
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaCapabilitiesInfo 接口包含三个布尔attribues：

trans-unit.source: The MediaConfigurationMediaCapabilities dictionary of the Media Capabilities API describes how media and audio files must be configured, or defined, to be passed as a parameter of the MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() and MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() methods.
trans-unit.target: Media Capabilities API的 MediaConfiguration MediaCapabilities 字典描述了如何配置或定义媒体和音频文件，以将其作为 MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() 和 MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() 方法的参数进行传递。

trans-unit.source: The MediaDecodingConfiguration dictionary of the Media Capabilities API is used to define the type of media being tested when calling MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() to query whether a specific media configuration is supported, smooth, and/or power efficient.
trans-unit.target: Media Capabilities API的 MediaDecodingConfiguration 字典用于定义在调用 MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() 以查询特定的媒体配置是否受支持，平滑和/或省电时所测试的媒体的类型。

trans-unit.source: The MediaDevices.ondevicechange property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the devicechange event occurs on a MediaDevices instance. This happens whenever the set of media devices available to the user agent and, by extension, to the web site or app has changed. You can at any time use enumerateDevices() to get the updated list of available devices.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaDevices.ondevicechange 属性是一个 EventHandler 时，被称为其指定的功能 devicechange 事件上的发生 MediaDevices 实例。每当用户代理以及扩展到网站或应用程序可用的媒体设备集发生更改时，就会发生这种情况。您可以随时使用 enumerateDevices() 获取可用设备的更新列表。

trans-unit.source: The MediaDevices interface provides access to connected media input devices like cameras and microphones, as well as screen sharing. In essence, it lets you obtain access to any hardware source of media data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaDevices 接口提供连接的媒体的输入设备如相机和麦克风，以及屏幕共享。本质上，它使您可以访问媒体数据的任何硬件源。

trans-unit.source: The MediaDevicesInfo interface contains information that describes a single media input or output device. The list of devices obtained by calling navigator.mediaDevices.enumerateDevices() is an array of MediaDeviceInfo objects, one per media device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaDevicesInfo 接口包含描述一个单一的媒体的输入或输出设备的信息。通过调用 navigator.mediaDevices.enumerateDevices() 获得的设备列表是 MediaDeviceInfo 对象的数组，每个媒体设备一个。

trans-unit.source: The MediaElementAudioDestinationNode interface represents an audio destination consisting of a WebRTCMediaStream with a single AudioMediaStreamTrack, which can be used in a similar way to a MediaStream obtained from Navigator.getUserMedia.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaElementAudioDestinationNode 接口表示音频目的地由的的WebRTC MediaStream 与单个 AudioMediaStreamTrack ，其可以以类似的方式被用于在 MediaStream 从获得 Navigator.getUserMedia 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaElementAudioSourceNode interface represents an audio source consisting of an HTML5 <audio> or <video> element. It is an AudioNode that acts as an audio source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaElementAudioSourceNode 接口表示选自由HTML5的音频源 <audio> 或 <video> 元素。它是一个 AudioNode ，充当音频源。

trans-unit.source: The MediaEncodingConfiguration dictionary of the Media Capabilities API is used to define the type of media being tested when calling MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() to query whether a specific media configuration is supported, smooth, and/or power efficient.
trans-unit.target: Media Capabilities API的 MediaEncodingConfiguration 字典用于在调用 MediaCapabilities.encodingInfo() 来查询特定的媒体配置是否受支持，是否平滑和/或省电时定义要测试的媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeyMessageEvent.message read-only property returns an ArrayBuffer with a message from the content decryption module. Messages vary by key system.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeyMessageEvent.message 只读属性返回一个 ArrayBuffer 与来自内容解密模块的消息。消息因密钥系统而异。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeyMessageEvent interface of the EncryptedMediaExtensions API contains the content and related data when the content decryption module generates a message for the session.
trans-unit.target: 当内容解密模块为会话生成消息时，EncryptedMediaExtensions API的 MediaKeyMessageEvent 接口包含内容和相关数据。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.close() method notifies that the current media session is no longer needed, and that the content decryption module should release any resources associated with this object and close it. Then, it returns a Promise.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySession.close() 方法通知，目前的媒体会话不再需要，并且内容解密模块应该释放与此对象关联的任何资源接近它。然后，它返回 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.closed read-only property returns a Promise signaling when a MediaKeySession closes. This promise can only be fulfilled and is never rejected. Closing a session means that licenses and keys associated with it are no longer valid for decrypting media data.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySession.closed 只读属性返回一个 Promise ，当信令 MediaKeySession 关闭。这个诺言只能兑现而绝不会被拒绝。关闭会话意味着与之关联的许可证和密钥对于解密媒体数据不再有效。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.generateRequest() method returns a Promise after generating a media request based on initialization data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySession.generateRequest() 方法返回一个 Promise 产生媒体请求之后基于初始化数据。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.load() method returns a Promise that resolves to a boolean value after loading data for a specified session object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySession.load() 方法返回一个 Promise 解析为用于指定会话对象加载数据之后的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.remove() method returns a Promise after removing any session data associated with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySession.remove() 方法返回一个 Promise 去除与当前对象相关联的任何会话数据之后。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySession.update() method loads messages and licenses to the CDM, and then returns a Promise .
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySession.update() 方法的负载信息和许可证的CDM，然后返回一个 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemAccess.createMediaKeys() method returns a Promise that resolves to a new MediaKeys object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySystemAccess.createMediaKeys() 方法返回一个 Promise 解析为一个新 MediaKeys 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemAccess.getConfiguration() method returns a MediaKeySystemConfiguration object with the supported combination of configuration options.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySystemAccess.getConfiguration() 方法返回 MediaKeySystemConfiguration 用的配置选项的支持的组合对象。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemAccess.keySystem read-only property returns a DOMString identifying the key system being used.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySystemAccess.keySystem 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 正在使用识别密钥系统。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemConfiguration.audioCapabilities read-only property returns an array of supported audio type and capability pairs.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySystemConfiguration.audioCapabilities 只读属性返回支持的音频类型和能力对阵列。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemConfiguration.distinctiveIdentifier read-only property indicates whether a persistent distinctive identifier is required.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySystemConfiguration.distinctiveIdentifier 只读属性指示是否需要一个持久的独特标识。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemConfiguration.initDataTypes read-only property returns a list of supported initialization data type names. An initialization data type is a string indicating the format of the initialization data.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySystemConfiguration.initDataTypes 只读属性返回支持初始化数据类型名称的列表。初始化数据类型是指示初始化数据格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemConfiguration.persistentState read-only property indicates whether the ability to persist state is required.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaKeySystemConfiguration.persistentState 只读属性指示是否需要坚持状态的能力。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeySystemConfiguration.videoCapabilities read-only property returns an array of supported video type and capability pairs.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeySystemConfiguration.videoCapabilities 只读属性返回支持的视频类型和能力对阵列。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeys.createSession() method returns a new MediaKeySession object, which represents a context for message exchange with a content decryption module (CDM).
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeys.createSession() 方法返回一个新 MediaKeySession 对象，其表示用于与内容解密模块（CDM）消息交换的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The MediaKeys interface of EncryptedMediaExtensions API the represents a set of keys that an associated HTMLMediaElement can use for decryption of media data during playback.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaKeys 的接口EncryptedMediaExtensions API的表示一组键，一个相关联的 HTMLMediaElement 可以在播放期间使用的媒体数据进行解密。

trans-unit.source: The MediaMetadata() constructor creates a new MediaMetadata object.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaMetadata() 构造函数创建一个新的 MediaMetadata 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MediaMetadata interface of the the Media Session API provides allows a web page to provide rich media metadata for display in a platform UI.
trans-unit.target: Media Session API提供的 MediaMetadata 接口允许网页提供富媒体元数据以在平台UI中显示。

trans-unit.source: The MediaQueryListEvent constructor creates a new MediaQueryListEvent instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaQueryListEvent 构造函数创建一个新的 MediaQueryListEvent 实例。

trans-unit.source: The MediaQueryListEvent object stores information on the changes that have happened to a MediaQueryList object — instances are available as the event object on a function referenced by a MediaQueryList.onchange property or MediaQueryList.addEvent() call.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaQueryListEvent 对已经发生的变化对象存储信息 MediaQueryList 对象-实例可用作为一个引用的函数的事件对象 MediaQueryList.onchange 财产或 MediaQueryList.addEvent() 调用。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder() constructor creates a new MediaRecorder object that will record a specified MediaStream.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder() 构造函数创建一个新的 MediaRecorder 对象，将记录指定的 MediaStream 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.isTypeSupported() method returns a Boolean which is true if the MIME type specified is one the user agent can record.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaRecorder.isTypeSupported() 方法返回一个布尔其为 true ，如果指定的MIME类型是一个用户代理可以记录。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.mimeType read-only property returns the MIME type that is being used as the recording container when it was created. This is the file format of the file that would result from writing all of the recorded data to disk. Keep in mind, of course, that the file format and the codecs associated with the individual tracks are different things entirely; writing tracks that work just fine in a WebM video into an MP4 wrapper may not result in a file that plays everywhere you want it to.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaRecorder.mimeType 只读属性返回创建时正被用作记录容器的MIME类型。这是由于将所有记录的数据写入磁盘而导致的文件格式。当然，请记住，与各个音轨相关联的文件格式和编解码器完全是不同的东西。将可以在WebM视频中正常工作的音轨写入MP4包装器可能不会导致文件在您希望播放的任何地方播放。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.ondataavailable event handler (part of the MediaStream Recording API) handles the dataavailable event, letting you run code in response to Blob data being made available for use.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.ondataavailable 事件处理程序（的部分MediaStream记录API）处理 dataavailable 事件，让您在响应运行代码 Blob 数据被提供使用。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.onpause event handler (part of the MediaRecorder API) handles the pause event, allowing you to run code in response to the media recording being paused.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.onpause 事件处理程序（的一部分MediaRecorder API）处理 pause 活动，让您在回应媒体记录被暂停运行代码。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.onresume event handler (part of the MediaRecorder API) handles the resume event, allowing you to run code in response to the media recording being resumed after pausing.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.onresume 事件处理程序（的一部分MediaRecorder API）处理 resume 活动，让您在回应媒体记录中运行代码，暂停后重新开始。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.onstartevent handler (part of the MediaRecorder API) handles the start event, allowing you to run code in response to media recording being started by a MediaRecorder.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.onstart 事件处理程序（的一部分MediaRecorder API）处理 start 的事件，让您在回应媒体记录由被启动运行代码 MediaRecorder 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.onstop event handler (part of the MediaRecorder API) handles the stop event, allowing you to run code in response to media recording via a MediaRecorder being stopped.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.onstop 事件处理程序（的一部分MediaRecorder API）处理 stop 活动，让您在回应媒体通过记录运行代码 MediaRecorder 停止。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.onwarning event handler (part of the MediaRecorder API) handles the recordingwarning event, allowing you to run code in response to non-fatal errors being thrown during media recording via a MediaRecorder, which don't halt recording.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.onwarning 事件处理程序（的一部分MediaRecorder API）处理 recordingwarning 活动，让您在应对非致命错误代码运行期间通过媒体记录被抛出 MediaRecorder ，哪些没有停止录制。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.requestData() method (part of the MediaRecorder API) is used to raise a dataavailable event containing a Blob object of the captured media as it was when the method was called. This can then be grabbed and manipulated as you wish.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaRecorder.requestData() 方法（的一部分MediaRecorder API）用于提升一个 dataavailable 含有事件 Blob 捕获的媒体的对象，因为它是当该方法被调用。然后，您可以根据需要抓住和操纵它。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.resume() method (part of the MediaRecorder API) is used to resume media recording when it has been previously paused.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaRecorder.resume() 方法（的一部分MediaRecorder API）用于恢复媒体时，它先前已经暂停记录。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.state read-only property returns the current state of the current MediaRecorder object.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.state 只读属性返回当前的当前状态 MediaRecorder 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.stop() method (part of the MediaRecorder API) is used to stop media capture.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaRecorder.stop() 方法（的一部分MediaRecorder API）用于停止媒体捕获。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder.stream read-only property returns the stream that was passed into the MediaRecorder() constructor when the MediaRecorder was created.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder.stream 只读属性返回传递到流 MediaRecorder() 的构造函数时 MediaRecorder 创建。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder interface of the MediaStream Recording API provides functionality to easily record media. It is created using the MediaRecorder() constructor.
trans-unit.target: MediaStream Recording API的 MediaRecorder 接口提供了轻松记录媒体的功能。它是使用 MediaRecorder() 构造函数创建的。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder is currently "inactive"; you can't pause recording if it's not active. If you call pause() while already paused, it silently does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder 目前是 "inactive" ; 如果未启用，则无法暂停录制。如果在已经暂停的情况下调用 pause() ，则它无任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorder is not in the inactive state; you can't start recording media if it's already being recorded. See the state property.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorder 不处于 inactive 状态; 如果已经在录制媒体，则无法开始录制。请参阅 state 属性。

trans-unit.source: The MediaRecorderErrorEvent interface represents errors returned by the MediaStream Recording API. It is an Event object that encapsulates a reference to a DOMException describing the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaRecorderErrorEvent 接口表示由返回的错误MediaStream记录API。它是一个 Event 对象，封装了对 DOMException 的引用，该引用描述了发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: The MediaSession interface of the Media Session API allows a web page to provide custom behaviors for standard media playback interactions.
trans-unit.target: Media Session API的 MediaSession 接口允许网页为标准媒体播放交互提供自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: The MediaSettingsRange interface of the the MediaStream Image Capture API provides the possible range and value size of PhotoCapabilities.imageHeight and PhotoCapabilities.imageWidth. A PhotoCapabilities object can be retrieved by calling ImageCapture.PhotoCapabilities().
trans-unit.target: MediaStream Image Capture API的 MediaSettingsRange 接口提供了 PhotoCapabilities.imageHeight 和 PhotoCapabilities.imageWidth 的可能范围和值大小。甲 PhotoCapabilities 对象可以通过调用被检索 ImageCapture.PhotoCapabilities() 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaSource interface of the Media Source Extensions API represents a source of media data for an HTMLMediaElement object. A MediaSource object can be attached to a HTMLMediaElement to be played in the user agent.
trans-unit.target: Media Source Extensions API的 MediaSource 接口代表 HTMLMediaElement 对象的媒体数据源。甲 MediaSource 的对象可以被附接到一个 HTMLMediaElement 在用户代理进行播放。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream() constructor returns a newly-created MediaStream, either empty or containing tracks, provided as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStream() 构造函数返回一个新创建的 MediaStream ，或者为空，或者含有轨道，作为参数提供。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream.addTrack() method adds a new track to the stream. The track is specified as a parameter of type MediaStreamTrack.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStream.addTrack() 方法增加了一个新的轨道到流中。该轨道被指定为 MediaStreamTrack 类型的参数。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream.getTrackById() method returns a MediaStreamTrack object representing the track with the specified ID string. If there is no track with the specified ID, this method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStream.getTrackById() 方法返回 MediaStreamTrack 表示与指定的ID字符串跟踪对象。如果没有具有指定ID的轨道，则此方法返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream.onaddtrack property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the addtrack event occurs on a MediaStream instance. This happens when a new track of any kind is added to the media stream. This event is fired when the browser adds a track to the stream (such as when a RTCPeerConnection is renegotiated or a stream being captured using HTMLMediaElement.captureStream() gets a new set of tracks because the media element being captured loaded a new source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStream.onaddtrack 属性是一个 EventHandler 时，被称为其指定的功能 addtrack 事件上的发生 MediaStream 实例。当将任何种类的新轨道添加到媒体流时，就会发生这种情况。当浏览器将跟踪添加到流中时（例如，重新协商 RTCPeerConnection 或使用 HTMLMediaElement.captureStream() 捕获的流获得新的轨道集时，会触发此事件，因为捕获的媒体元素已加载新的源。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStream.onremovetrack property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the removetrack event occurs on a MediaStream instance. This happens when a track of any kind is removed from the media stream. This event is fired when the browser removes a track from the stream (such as when a RTCPeerConnection is renegotiated or a stream being captured using HTMLMediaElement.captureStream() gets a new set of tracks because the media element being captured loaded a new source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStream.onremovetrack 属性是一个 EventHandler 时，被称为其指定的功能 removetrack 事件上的发生 MediaStream 实例。从媒体流中删除任何类型的轨道时，都会发生这种情况。当浏览器从流中删除轨道时（例如，重新协商 RTCPeerConnection 或使用 HTMLMediaElement.captureStream() 捕获的流获得新的轨道集时，会触发此事件，因为捕获的媒体元素加载了新的源。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreaminterface represents a stream of media content. A stream consists of several trackssuch as video or audio tracks. Each track is specified as an instance of MediaStreamTrack.You can obtain a MediaStream object either by using the constructor or by calling MediaDevices.getUserMedia().
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStream 接口代表的媒体内容流。流由几个轨道组成，例如视频或音频轨道。每个轨道都指定为 MediaStreamTrack 的实例。您可以使用构造函数或调用 MediaDevices.getUserMedia() 来获取MediaStream对象。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamAudioSourceNode interface represents an audio source consisting of a WebRTCMediaStream (such as a webcam or microphone.) It is an AudioNode that acts as an audio source.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStreamAudioSourceNode 接口表示由一个音频源的WebRTC MediaStream （如网络摄像机或麦克风。）它是一个 AudioNode ，它作为一个音频源。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamConstraints dictionary is used when calling getUserMedia() to specify what kinds of tracks should be included in the returned MediaStream, and, optionally, to establish constraints for those tracks' settings.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStreamConstraints 字典使用时调用 getUserMedia() 来指定什么样的轨道应包含在返回 MediaStream ，以及可选，以建立这些曲目设置的限制。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamTrackinterface represents a single media track within a stream; typically, these are audio or video tracks, but other track types may exist as well.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaStreamTrack 接口表示流内的单个媒体轨道; 通常，这些是音频或视频轨道，但也可以存在其他轨道类型。

trans-unit.source: The MediaStreamTrackEvent interface represents events which indicate that a MediaStream has had tracks added to or removed from the stream through calls to Media Stream API methods. These events are sent to the stream when these changes occur.
trans-unit.target: 该 MediaStreamTrackEvent 接口代表表明，事件 MediaStream 已通过调用添加的曲目或从物流中除去媒体流API的方法。这些更改发生时，会将这些事件发送到流。

trans-unit.source: The MediaTrackConstraints dictionary is used to describe a set of capabilities and the value or values each can take on. A constraints dictionary is passed into applyConstraints() to allow a script to establish a set of exact (required) values or ranges and/or preferred values or ranges of values for the track, and the most recently-requested set of custom constraints can be retrieved by calling getConstraints().
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaTrackConstraints 字典用于描述一组能力，并且每个可以在一个或多个值。将约束字典传递到 applyConstraints() 中,以允许脚本为轨道建立一组精确的（必需）值或范围和/或首选值或值范围，并且最近请求的一组自定义约束可以是通过调用 getConstraints() 检索。

trans-unit.source: The MediaTrackSettings dictionary is used to return the current values configured for each of a MediaStreamTrack's settings. These values will adhere as closely as possible to any constraints previously described using a MediaTrackConstraints object and set using applyConstraints(), and will adhere to the default constraints for any properties whose constraints haven't been changed, or whose customized constraints couldn't be matched.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaTrackSettings 字典用于返回构造的每一个的当前值 MediaStreamTrack 的设置。这些值将尽可能符合先前使用 MediaTrackConstraints 对象描述的任何约束，并使用 applyConstraints() 进行设置，并将遵守其约束未更改或自定义约束无法更改的所有属性的默认约束。匹配。

trans-unit.source: The MediaTrackSupportedConstraints dictionary establishes the list of constrainable properties recognized by the user agent or browser in its implementation of the MediaStreamTrack object. An object conforming to MediaTrackSupportedConstraints is returned by MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints().
trans-unit.target: 所述 MediaTrackSupportedConstraints 字典建立由所识别可限制的属性列表的用户代理在其执行的浏览器或 MediaStreamTrack 对象。 MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints() 返回符合 MediaTrackSupportedConstraints 的对象。

trans-unit.source: The MerchantValidationEvent() constructor creates a new MerchantValidationEvent object. You should not have to create these events yourself; instead, just handle the merchantvalidation event.
trans-unit.target: 该 MerchantValidationEvent() 构造函数创建一个新的 MerchantValidationEvent 对象。您不必自己创建这些事件。相反，只需处理 merchantvalidation 事件。

trans-unit.source: The MerchantValidationEvent interface of the the Payment Request API enables a merchant to verify themselves as allowed to use a particular payment handler.
trans-unit.target: 付款请求API的 MerchantValidationEvent 接口使商家能够验证自己是否被允许使用特定的付款处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The MessageChannel() constructor of the MessageChannel interface returns a new MessageChannel object with two new MessagePort objects.
trans-unit.target: MessageChannel 接口的 MessageChannel() 构造函数返回带有两个新 MessagePort 对象的新 MessageChannel 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MessageChannel interface of the Channel Messaging API allows us to create a new message channel and send data through it via its two MessagePort properties.
trans-unit.target: Channel Messaging API的 MessageChannel 接口允许我们创建一个新的消息通道，并通过其两个 MessagePort 属性通过它发送数据。

trans-unit.source: The MessageEvent() constructor creates a new MessageEvent object instance.
trans-unit.target: 该 MessageEvent() 构造函数创建一个新 MessageEvent 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The MessagePort interface of the Channel Messaging API represents one of the two ports of a MessageChannel, allowing messages to be sent from one port and listening out for them arriving at the other.
trans-unit.target: Channel Messaging API的 MessagePort 接口代表 MessageChannel 的两个端口之一，从而允许从一个端口发送消息，并侦听它们到达另一个端口。

trans-unit.source: The Metadata interface is used by the File and Directory Entries API to contain information about a file system entry. This metadata includes the file's size and modification date and time.
trans-unit.target: 该 Metadata 接口使用的文件和目录项API包含了大约一个文件系统条目的信息。此元数据包括文件的大小以及修改日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The MimeType interface provides contains information about a MIME type associated with a particular plugin. NavigatorPlugins.mimeTypes returns an array of this object.
trans-unit.target: 在 MimeType 接口提供包含关于与特定插件相关联的MIME类型的信息。 NavigatorPlugins.mimeTypes 返回此对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: The MimeTypeArray interface returns an array of MimeType instances, each of which contains information about a supported browser plugins. This object is returned by NavigatorPlugins.mimeTypes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MimeTypeArray 接口返回的数组 MimeType 的实例，其中的每一个包含关于所支持的浏览器插件的信息。该对象由 NavigatorPlugins.mimeTypes 返回。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent() constructor creates a new MouseEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该 MouseEvent() 构造函数创建一个新 MouseEvent 。

trans-unit.target: 该 MouseEvent.altKey 只读属性是一个 Boolean 表示，如果

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.button read-only property indicates which button was pressed on the mouse to trigger the event.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MouseEvent.button 只读属性指示按下鼠标上的哪个按钮以触发事件。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.ctrlKey read-only property returns a Boolean that indicates if the
trans-unit.target: 该 MouseEvent.ctrlKey 只读属性返回一个 Boolean ，表示如果

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.getModifierState() method returns the current state of the specified modifier key: true if the modifier is active (i.e., the modifier key is pressed or locked), otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MouseEvent.getModifierState() 方法返回指定修饰键的当前状态： true 如果该改性剂是活性的（即，修改键被按下或锁定），否则， false 。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.metaKey read-only property returning a Boolean that indicates if the
trans-unit.target: 该 MouseEvent.metaKey 只读返回属性 Boolean 表示，如果

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.movementX read-only property provides the shift in the X coordinate of the mouse pointer between that event and the previous mousemove event. In other words, the value of that property is computed that way : currentEvent.movementX = currentEvent.screenX - previousEvent.screenX.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MouseEvent.movementX 只读属性提供了事件和前一之间的鼠标指针的X的移位坐标 mousemove 事件。换句话说，该属性的值将通过以下方式计算： currentEvent.movementX = currentEvent.screenX - previousEvent.screenX 。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.movementYread-only property provides the shift in the Y coordinate of the mouse pointer between that event and the previous mousemove event. In other words, the value of that property is computed that way : currentEvent.movementY = currentEvent.screenY - previousEvent.screenY.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MouseEvent.movementY 只读属性提供了事件和前一之间的鼠标指针的Y移位坐标 mousemove 事件。换句话说，该属性的值是通过以下方式计算的： currentEvent.movementY = currentEvent.screenY - previousEvent.screenY 。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.region read-only property returns the id of the canvas hit region affected by the event. If no hit region is affected, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 该 MouseEvent.region 只读属性返回的ID 帆布命中区域受事件影响。如果未影响任何命中区域，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The MouseEvent.relatedTarget read-only property is the secondary target for the event, if there is one. That is:
trans-unit.target: 该 MouseEvent.relatedTarget 只读属性是该事件的次要目标，如果有一个。那是：

trans-unit.target: 该 MouseEvent.shiftKey 只读属性指示是否
